title: sa_āṅgirasasmṛti
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>
      <div>
	<pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='1'/>
	<head>āṅgirasasmṛtiḥ</head>
	<div type='part' n='1'>
	  <head>pūrvāṅgirasam</head>
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāvakapratimaṃ sākṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>munimāṅgirasaṃ dvijāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brūhi dharmānaśeṣānnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ityūcuḥ praṇipatya tam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.2'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tebhyaḥ sa tu tataḥ prītyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śṛṇudhvamiti cāphaṇat</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vacmi tānakhilān dharmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaidikān muktaye parān</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.3'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmaḥ syāccodanā proktas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadanyastūpacārataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>liṅādirūpā sā jñeyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muktidā śruticoditā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.4'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutyuktaliṅloṭtavyapra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyayalakṣaṇalakṣitā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>codanā saiva nānyā sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>purāṇasmṛticoditā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>purāṇoktaṃ na kuryāt</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.5'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na vaidikaḥ purāṇoktaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karmāṇi manubhiścaret</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='2'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vedoktaireva tairmantrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nikhilāni samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.6'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>karmamadhye purāṇokta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantroccāraṇamātrataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naśyettu vaidikaṃ karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmāttu na tathā<orig>''</orig>caret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.7'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>purāṇokteṣveṣu satsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>laukikeṣu tathā<orig>''</orig>caret</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>mantrābhāve vyāhṛtayaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mantrābhāve tu sarvatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smṛtā vyāhṛtayaḥ kila</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.8'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anvaye liṅgato 'rthādvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>virodhābhāvataḥ pare</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tattanmantrā saṃbhavanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣu teṣu tu karmasu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.9'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāyaścittaṃ dṛśyate naṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatra kutrāpi tatra vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyaitatkathitaṃ divyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaścittaṃ mahattaram</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.10'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puṇyā vyāhṛtayaśceti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā ṛgvā vaiṣṇavī śivā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvapāpapraśamanī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cintitārthaikadāyinī</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.11'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāyaścittakriyāhetor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirṇītā viṣṇunā purā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na vyāhṛtisamo mantro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na vyāhṛtisamo japaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.12'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na vyāhṛtisamastīrtho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na vyāhatisamaṃ tapaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na vyāhatisamo yajño</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na vyāhṛtisamāḥ kriyāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='3'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.13'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmātsarvatra tā dṛṣṭāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaścittāya kevalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmādvaidikakṛtyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>laukikānāmaśeṣataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.14'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pramādākaraṇe kṛtsne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tattyāge buddhipūrvake</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ajñānināṃ jñānināṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāvakāstārakāḥ parāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.15'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uttārakā vyāhṛtayo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛcā yuktāstayā punaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>jātakarmādyatikrame</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karmaṇo 'karaṇe jāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāmnorvyāhatayaḥ smṛtāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.16'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dinaikasādhyāḥ kathitās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā nāmākhyakarmaṇaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathānnaprāśanasyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caulasyākaraṇe tataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.17'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>divasadvayasādhyā yāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parā vyāhṛtayaḥ smṛtāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paścānmauñjī prakartavyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mauñjyāstvakaraṇe tathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.18'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mukhyakāle ṣoḍaśābda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>paryantaṃ daśamāditaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dinatrayacatuṣpañca</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣaṭsaptāṣṭanavādikāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.19'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rātrayaḥ kathitāstasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tajjapastasya niṣkṛtiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kimanyeṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yasya nāsti hi niṣkṛtiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.20'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyaitāḥ kathitāḥ sadbhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satataṃ vedavādibhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>japtvaitā vyāhṛtīrdivyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaścittāya kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.21'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'><orig>(</orig>paripūtāḥ<orig>)</orig> tataḥ sadyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tattatkarma samārabhet</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='4'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pākārambhasamārambhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhamātrasya saṃtatam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.22'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prabhaveddhi viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkalpastu na tasya vai</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>śrāddhapākānantaramāśaucaṃ yadi</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi daivādyatnamadhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavetsūtakamṛtvijām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.23'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatkriyākaraṇe tattu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na teṣāṃ vārakaṃ bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatkriyārthaṃ prathamataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>snātvā samyak samantrakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.24'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatkriyāmatha kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāvatteṣāṃ na sūtakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karmakāle tadāśaucaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadyo vilayameti vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.25'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vṛtte karmaṇi bhūyaśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadudeti svayaṃ punaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>pākārambhānantaraṃ tadvīthyāṃ mṛtisaṃbhave</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāddhe pākasamārambhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛtte 'tha nipatecchavam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.26'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadvīthyāṃ tena tacchrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūṣitaṃ na bhavedapi</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>pākārambhātpūrvaṃ tadvīthyāṃ mṛtisaṃbhave</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pākārambhasya pūrvaṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhavecchrāddhavārakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.27'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śavaṃ vīthyāṃ nipatitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pākārambhātparaṃ tu na</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upakrāntasya tasyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sūtakaṃ yadi madhyataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.28'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apyāgataṃ tena taddhi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāritaṃ na bhaviṣyati</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='5'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmācchrāddhamupakrāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sūtake 'pi tathā<orig>''</orig>caret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.29'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ātarpaṇaṃ vidhānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pākasyārambhato 'khilam</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>darśapūrṇamāseṣṭipaśubandhānantaraṃ śrāddham</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarveṣāṃ vratakṛchrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vārakaṃ śrāddhamekakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.30'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāpi vārako yāgaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paurṇamāsaśca dārśikaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paurṇamāsaṃ ca darśaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśubandhaṃ ca taddine</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.31'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samāgataṃ samāpyā<orig>''</orig>dau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paścācchrāddhaṃ samācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitṛkriyādinaprāpta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāgānuṣṭhānato 'khilāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.32'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vasavaścāpi rudrāścāpy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ādityāścaiva kṛtsnaśaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadrūpāḥ pitaraḥ sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarve cāpi pitāmahāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.33'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nityatṛptā bhaveyurvai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nikhilāḥ prapitāmahāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīkṣāprāptyā tu bhūyiṣṭhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tṛptisteṣāṃ bhaviṣyati</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>mahādīkṣāmadhyagataśrāddham</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.34'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyabdamāsastanmāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīkṣā yā na bhaviṣyati</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratyabdamapi pitrostan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na pitṛvyādikaṃ matam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.35'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahādīkṣāmadhyagataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatameva bhaviṣyati</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahādīkṣāgatasyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadante karaṇaṃ nanu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='6'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.36'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīkṣāmahatyastā jñeyāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caturviṃśaddinādhikāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>kharvadīkṣāmadhye</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tisrastābhyastu yā nyūnās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>triṣaḍādidinātmakāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.37'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kharvātmakāstā vijñeyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanmadhyagatapaitṛkam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadvā tadante tatkāryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyatkabalitaṃ tayā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>dīkṣāvṛddhau</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.38'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahatyā dīkṣayā karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satreṣvevaṃ gataṃ gatam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kāryamiti vācyaṃ kiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīkṣāvṛddhau kathaṃcana</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.39'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃprāptamapi tacchrāddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avaśāddaivayogataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadanta eva kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyā api punaḥ kadā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.40'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daivayogena cidvṛddher</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahattvaṃ cetsamāgatam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāraṇāntarasaṃgatyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadante cetkṛtākṛtam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>dīkṣāmadhyamṛte na saṃskāraḥ kartavyaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.41'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tacchrāddhaṃ bhavatītyāhur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīkṣāmadhyamṛtānapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na saṃskuryānnāpi paśyet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃskuryāttadvyatikrame</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='7'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.42'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>karmaṇo vaidikasyaivaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prābalyaṃ pratipāditam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brahmavidbhirmahābhāgair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmajñaistattvadarśibhiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.43'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dānatīrthavratādibhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛchrebhyo 'pi viśiṣyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaidikaṃ tu mahatkarma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaidikaṃ prabhavettataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.44'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śuddhaḥ sanneva kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaidikaṃ karma nāśuciḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśaucādaśucitvaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇānāṃ bhaviṣyati</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>sūtyāśaucasyāspṛśyatvam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.45'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sūtyāśauce mṛtāśauce</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaidikaṃ karma nācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aspṛśyatvaṃ na sūtyāṃ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśauce tu bhaveddhi tat</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.46'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ubhayorbhojanaṃ kuryān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāgurunipātane</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahorātraṃ bhuktihainyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarveṣāmapi tanmatam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.47'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akālabhuktirāśauce</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūtyāśauce na tanmatam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃdhyāmātraṃ prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayormānasamantrataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.48'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadvitricaturnārī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>naṣṭāśaucasya cetpunaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśauce vartamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃghātāśaucinastataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.49'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sākṣādannasya muktirna</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃdhyā sā syājjale kriyā</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>satatāśaucasaṃbhave</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śatajñātigatagrāma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāsinaḥ saṃtatāghinaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.50'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sūtakānte punaḥprāpta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūtakasya nirantaram</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='8'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abdaṃ dṛṣṭvā tato yatnāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyaktvā taṃ grāmamādarāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.51'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadyo deśāntare pitroḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāddhaṃ kāryamiti sthitiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadā paraṃparāgho 'sya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāyate śrāddhavārakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.52'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadā saṃvatsaraṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadyo deśāntaraṃ vrajet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi vighno na jāyeta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhasyātha tathā tadā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.53'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāddhaṃ tatraiva kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhṛtayajñopavītavān</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekadaiva samākrāntaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sūtakatrayato yadi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.54'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekāśaucena vā paścād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yajñasūtraṃ tu bibhṛyāt</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñasūtravihīnaḥ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anarhaḥ sarvakarmasu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.55'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhāve tasya sūtrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>celaṃ vājinameva vā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhārayati vidhānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na mantrastatra vidyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.56'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sūtrasyaiva bhavenmantraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śikhāhīnaśca tādṛśaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>śatrucchinnaśikhaścet</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śatrucchinnaśikhaḥ sadyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bibhran karṇe śuciryatan</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.57'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samagopucchalomāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prājāpatyaprapūrvakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punaḥsaṃskārataḥ śuddhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhavennātra saṃśayaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='9'/>
	  <note type='subheading'>madhyacchede</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.58'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madhyacchinnā yadā cūḍā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prājāpatyena śudhyati</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>rogādinā nāśe</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śikhāyā rogato nāśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtsnāyāḥ saṃkaṭe 'pi vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.59'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avaśādvahnito vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punaḥsaṃskāra eva hi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śikhārohaṇataḥ paścān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tatpūrvaṃ samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.60'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāvadgopucchalomāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhāryāṇyeva vidhānataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathāvat sā tu na bhaved</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vārdhakeṇa ca rogataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>saptatyūrdhvaṃ romabhiḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.61'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saptatyūrdhvaṃ tu cettasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'pi vā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pārśvataḥ parito vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samudbhūtaiśca romabhiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.62'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śikhā kāryā prayatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na cennaivopapadyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatsthāne sarvaśūnye tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parito vāpi kiṃ punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.63'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brāhmaṇyasūcanāyaivaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāni lomāni dhārayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyathā na bhavedeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā tasmātsamācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.64'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ varṣāṣṭake 'tīte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tārtīyīkāśramaṃ vrajet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śikhā sūtra ca tadyugmaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇatvasya mūlake</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.65'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yayā kayā ca vidhayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śikhāṃ sūtraṃ ca bibhṛyāt</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='10'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śikhācchedo pañcavāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yadi jāyeta śatrubhiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.66'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brāhmaṇyaṃ tasya naṣṭaṃ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punaḥsaṃskārato 'pi tat</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>śrāddhavighne strīsaṃge</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāddhavighne samutpanne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>santataṃ sūtakādinā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.67'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akṛtvaiva tadā śrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nopeyācca striyaṃ tarām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā yadyāhito garbho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brahmahatyāvrataṃ caret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.68'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadā sakṛtsannipāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prājāpatyatrayaṃ caret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asakṛdgamanāccāpā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>grayānaṃ ca samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.69'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyopanayanaṃ bhūyaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>coditaṃ brahmavādibhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviṣṭaparakāyo yaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svabhāryā tena varṣmaṇā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.70'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nopeyāttatpraviṣṭaḥ san</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nopeyāttasya tāmapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tādṛśaṃ karma kuryāccet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatkulaṃ svakulaṃ ca te</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.71'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ātmānaṃ pātayeddhore</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>narake rauravābhidhe</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naṣṭe triprāyake śrāddhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvasmin haviṣi kvacit</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.72'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadā punastatsaṃpādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hutvā prāṇādibhiścarum</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvātriśadāhuteḥ paścāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taccheṣeṇa samāpanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.73'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yattattriprāyakaṃ śrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyāgūśca samāpanam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aparāhne ca madhyāhne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadyaḥ pakvaṃ bhaveddhi vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.74'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛthak pākāttasyaṃ bhuktir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvitīye tatra naiva sā</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='11'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viprāṇāṃ bhuktimātraṃ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ābhāntyetatsamācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.75'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃbhāntyatha mṛtāhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samārambho vidhīyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvaśeṣaṃ samādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>piṇḍāstrīnava nirvapet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.76'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avaśiṣṭaṃ prāśayecca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>triprāyakavidhau tathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatnānmahābhītimati</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścātsyādbhūribhojanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>lājahomātpūrvaṃ yadi rajasvalā</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.77'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arvāktu lājahomasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vadhūryadi rajasvalā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>haviṣmatīti mantreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śatakumbhairvidhānataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.78'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>snāpayitvā vidhānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vastrābhyāṃ saṃparītyataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>natvā dvivāraṃ yatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuñjānāhutiyugmakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.79'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛthagagnau sthāpite 'tha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>juhuyātsaṃskṛtaṃ ghṛtam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paścāttantraṃ prayoktavyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ābrāhmaṇavisarjanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.80'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yoktraṃ vimucya tāṃ patnīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūratastu vinikṣipet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paścāccaturthadivase</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>snātāyāṃ samanantaram</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.81'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pravāhanādikarmāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidhinaiva samācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ubhayostu tadā nityaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidhinā syātpayovratam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.82'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadaupāsanahomaḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samārambhāttu tanmatam</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>lājahomātparaṃ cet</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lājahomātparaṃ sā cet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā tatsnānataḥ param</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='12'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.83'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arvāktu śeṣahomasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tūṣṇīkaṃ mantravarjitam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vastradvayaṃ pradāyāsyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tābhyāmācchādya tatparam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.84'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apāvṛtte tṛtīye ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divase 'tha caturthake</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahni dvitīyayāme vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śatakumbhairamantritaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.85'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhiṣekaṃ kārayitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śeṣaṃ karma samācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>aupāsane tvanārabdhe dvitīye 'hni cet</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aupāsane tvanārabdhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvitīyadivase yadi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.86'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rajasvalā tadā tasyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>haviṣmanmantrasecanāt</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paraṃ vastradvayaṃ datvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tūṣṇīkaṃ mantravarjanāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.87'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tābhyāmācchādya tatpaścāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sahasrairudakumbhakaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caturthadivase kuryād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhiṣekaṃ samantrakaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.88'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pañcagavyastilaiḥ śvetaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarṣapaiḥ sarvadhānyakaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyāhṛtyā caiva gāyatryā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hunedaṣṭottaraṃ śatam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.89'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṣṭottarasahasraṃ cet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvadoṣaharaṃ param</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āyuṣyasūktaṃ hutvātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caruṇā lājato 'pi vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.90'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>homaśeṣaṃ samāpyātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karmaśeṣaṃ samāpayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paścācchuddhimavāpnoti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karmaṇastasya kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.91'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatpañcame 'tha divase</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvaupāsanaparigrahaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayāthaṃ saṃgamo māsād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>garbhādhānavidhānataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.92'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadgṛhakṣetramanasāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parasparavirodhataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='13'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niruddhapretakṛtyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sūtakaṃ tatsamāpanāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.93'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niruddhapretakṛtyā ye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taddravyaharaṇecchayā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatsamāpanaparyantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣāṃ tatsūtakaṃ bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>āśauce nityanaimittikādi</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.94'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatsamāpanaparyantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na kuryuḥ śubhakarma ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brahmayajñādikaṃ tathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.95'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na svādhyāyaṃ na vā homaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na sabhāyāḥ praveśanam</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>pretakṛtyarodhe</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kurvīta manasā saṃdhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na svādūni ca bhakṣayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.96'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāni kuryāttu mohena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa preto na sahiṣyati</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāpaṃ ghoraṃ dadātyeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmāttatkṛtyarodhanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.97'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manasāpi na kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taccāṇḍālaṃ prakīrtitam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtyaṃ ghoraṃ hi duṣṭaṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tādṛśaṃ na tadācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>atyanyāyādi kalau na kārayet</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.98'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atyanyāyamatidroham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atikrauryaṃ kalāvapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atyakramaṃ cātyaśāstraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kuryānna ca kārayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.99'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi kurvīta mohena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadyo vilayameṣyati</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kartā kārayitā cāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prerakaśca nirodhakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='14'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.100'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatsahāyaśca sarve te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>layameṣyanti satvaram</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhakṣetrādikaṃ sarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na nityaṃ śubhakāriṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.101'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tannimittamidaṃ rūpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāpaṃ martyo na cā<orig>''</orig>caret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgāmisūtakaṃ jñātvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samupakrāntakarmaṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.102'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṅgāpakarṣaṇaṃ naiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuryāditi manormatam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāgate sūtake 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samupakrāntakarmaṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.103'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṅgāni tattatkāleṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuryāttatra na sūtakī</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavedeva tadā sadyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gate tasmin punastathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>jītpitṛkapiṇḍapitṛyajñādiśrāddham</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.104'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>api jīvatpitā piṇḍa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛyajñaṃ samācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māsi śrāddhaṃ tathā homād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṣṭakāṃ pitṛyajñataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.105'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>piturviyogātparataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>piṇḍadānaṃ samācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenāyaṃ śrāddhakartā syānna</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātuḥ piṇḍadānataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.106'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jīve pitari cecchrāddhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāpte naimittike yadi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yebhya eva pitā dadyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tebhyo dadyāttu tatsutaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.107'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ pitāmahe jīve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yebhyo dadyāt sa hi svayam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tebhyo dadyāttu tatpautras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā syātpripitāmahe</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='15'/>
	  <note type='subheading'>pitari saṃnyaste pātityādidūṣite tatpitrādiśrāddham</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.108'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃnyaste patite tāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrāntacitte calātmani</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatkartṛkāṇi śrāddhāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayaṃ putraḥ samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.109'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tattatkāleṣu vidhivac</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chrāddhakartā na tena saḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>teṣāmakaraṇātso 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadyaścaṇḍālatāṃ vrajet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.110'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāddhādhikārī piṇḍasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dānamātreṇa jāyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṛtviktvena vṛte tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tu kartā bhavedayam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.111'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pituḥ piṇḍapradānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāddhakartā bhavedayam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāddhādhikārasidhyarthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuryādekādaśe 'hani</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.112'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pārvaṇaṃ tadvidhānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pituḥ siddheranantaram</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karmandī brahmabhūtasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā tasminniyojayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.113'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratisaṃvatsaraṃ siddhi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dine śrāddhaṃ samācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paścādārādhanaṃ kuryāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasminno cetpare 'hani</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.114'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahmabhūtasya tasyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvadevādirūpiṇaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃgacchate pitṛtvaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena rūpeṇa taṃ tathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.115'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmin śrāddhadine bhaktyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yajedeva vidhānataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tādṛk tadyajanaṃ cāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhanāmakakarmaṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='16'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.116'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhikāritvasidhyarthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmāttenaiva taṃ yajet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na mātaraṃ pitṛtvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yajeta tu kathaṃcana</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.117'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitṛtvaṃ mātari gatam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekaśeṣajamalpakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā na tatkāryakaraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātṛtvamapi tattathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>pitṛvyapatnyādīnām</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.118'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitṛvyapatnyādīnāṃ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tādṛkpatnītvameva hi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāsāṃ bhavati tasmāttu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tanmātṛtvamucyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.119'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitṛtvamapi mātṛtvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dānato nāśameṣyataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatkarmaṇi punaḥ prāpte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jananītvādinā bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.120'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitṛtvamapi mātṛtvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekatraiva hi tiṣṭhati</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tiṣṭhati tadanyatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriyāśatasahasrakāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>gauṇamātari</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.121'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gauṇamātari mātṛtvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puraskṛtyārthalobhataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samuccārya kriyāṃ kuryān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na sā tadgā bhaveddhruvam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.122'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lobhānmātṛtvamanyāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi nikṣipya mohataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kriyāṃ kuryājjaḍamatiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadyaścaṇḍālatāṃ vrajet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.123'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atasmin tattvamāropya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃskuryādyadi kāmataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣphalaṃ yāti tatkarma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>so 'pi pātityamāpnuyāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.124'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitṛtvaṃ janitaryeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukhyato 'nyatra gauṇataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatpuraskṛtya cetkarma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtamanyaiḥ punaḥ kriyāṃ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='17'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.125'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vihitenaiva putratvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svīkāreṇa na cānyataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samavāpnoti bandhūnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājavidvadanujñayā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>bhrātṛjaḥ kṛtadāraḥ kṛtakriyo 'pi</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.126'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrātṛjo vākyataḥ pitror</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jyaiṣṭhyakāniṣṭhyavarjitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putratvaṃ samavāpnoti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtadāraḥ kṛtakriyaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.127'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'pyekaścedavāpnoti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nobhayostu tathā vidhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>janiturmukhyasūnuḥ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyasya guṇataḥ sutaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.128'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātulatvapitṛvyatva</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sutatvādyanubandhakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mukhyato yasya yadvā syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taduddiśyaiva tatkriyā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.129'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mukhyānubandhaṃ tyaktvā yaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karma kuryātpramādataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitṛvyādikamuccārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punaḥ kuryāttu tāṃ kriyām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>gotranāmānubandhavyatyāse</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.130'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gotranāmānubandhānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyatyāsenāpyanehasaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi kuryātkriyāṃ tāṃ vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punaḥ kuryādyathāvidhi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.131'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upanītastu cedupa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>netṛtvenaiva tatkriyā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyādatvena taddātur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaktadatvena tatprade</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.132'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhayapatvena bhayape</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛvyatvena tādṛśe</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tattaduccāraṇaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tattatkarma samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.133'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadanyathākṛtaṃ taccet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samyagbhūyaḥ samācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='18'/>
	    <note type='subheading'>kartari dūrage preṣyatvena kurvīta</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mukhyakartrasamīpe 'nyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kuryāt svānubandhataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.134'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatpreṣyatvena kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>preṣitastena vai vṛtaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avṛtastena tatpreṣya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvena taddūrage sati</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.135'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtaṃ cetkarma tadbhūyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkalpādi samācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>anyena kṛte vāṅmātradāne śrāddhamātram</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāṅmātradattaputrastu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtadāraḥ kṛtakriyaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.136'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>grāhakasya na kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>darśādi na kadācana</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatpatnyāstasya ca śrāddha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātraṃ samyak samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.137'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prativarṣaṃ prayatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na darśādikamācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satāmeva hi bandhūnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karma kuryāt prayatnataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.138'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhraṣṭānāmapi tucchānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>patitānāṃ vikarmiṇām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kurvīta kriyāṃ yatnād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>api snānaṃ samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.139'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asatāṃ patitānāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhasmāntaṃ sūtakaṃ smṛtam</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>bhraṣṭapatitānāṃ ghaṭasphoṭanādhikāriṇaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātibhraṣṭānakarmiṣṭhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patitān mātaraṃ sutam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.140'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitaraṃ bhrātaraṃ patnīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>patimeva mitho 'sataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyajedghaṭaprahāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nānyānevaṃ samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='19'/>
	  <note type='subheading'>anāthapretasaṃskāre</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.141'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anāthapretasaṃskārād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pretanirvāpaṇaṃ proktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atra saṃskāraśabdataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>pretasaṃskārābhāve</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.142'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akṛtvā pretasaṃskāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yo bhuṅkte kāmakārataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatpretakṛtapāpaughaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatkṣaṇāllabhate 'khilam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.143'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taddoṣaśamanāyātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cāpāgre snānamācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māsamātraṃ prayatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na cedukthyaṃ samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>viprānujñayā yatikṛtyam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.144'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viprābhyanujñayā kuryāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karmamātraṃ viśeṣataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitṛkṛtyaṃ pretakṛtyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayorno cedyaterapi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.145'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viprānujñāṃ yatirapi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdhvā snātvārdravastrataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pretakṛtyaṃ prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na cet kṛtyaṃ tu tanna tu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.146'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>api śāstrakṛtaṃ karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahuviprāmataṃ tu yat</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadabhyanujñayā tattu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karmataḥ punarācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.147'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahuvipratiraskāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pradveṣāgaḥpradūṣitam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadabhyanujñārahitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yattatkarma punaścaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>kartari sannihite 'kartṛkṛtaṃ punaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.148'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadyakartṛkṛtaṃ karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samīpe kartari sthite</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='20'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanavṛttigṛhakṣetra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>hetave tatpunaścaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>asagotrasaṃskṛtāvāśaucam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.149'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asagotramapi pretaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāhayedyaḥ kathaṃcana</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa cāpi gotribhistulyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daśāhaṃ sūtakī bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>mṛtāhasya parityāge mātāpitroḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.150'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛtāhasya parityāge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mohātkṛchradvayaṃ caret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāyatrīdaśasāhasra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>japo godānameva ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.151'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ pañcatriṃśavarṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>paryantaṃ cittamucyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛthaktvena mahābhāgais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadūrdhvaṃ patito bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>nadīsnānena niṣkṛtiḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.152'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahānadīsnānaśataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitrostyakte tu paitṛke</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣkṛtiḥ kathitā sadbhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punaḥsaṃskāratastathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.153'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nadīsnānāni sarvatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvakṛtyeṣu vacmi vaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣkṛtitvena viprāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vedināmabhyanujñayā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.154'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na hi snānena sadṛśī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣkṛtirvihitāsti hi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmātsnānāni sarvatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tīrthādiṣu viśiṣyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>saṃhitāpaṭhanādiḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.155'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutipārāyaṇaṃ yadvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyāhṛtīnāṃ japo 'thavā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāyatryā vā japo no cen</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahārudrajapo 'thavā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.156'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puruṣasūktajapo vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃhitāpaṭhanaṃ sakṛt</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣkṛtirvihitā sadbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>api pātakināmapi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='21'/>
	  <note type='subheading'>vedamahimā</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.157'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vedākṣaroccāraṇataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvanāmaphalaṃ labhet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harināmāni yāvanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṭhitāni dvijātibhiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.158'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asaṃkhyākānyanantāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvāvilaharāṇyapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tānyekavedavarṇaḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tādṛśairdivyavarṇakaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.159'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ameyaiḥ saṃvṛto vedaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sākṣānnārāyaṇātmakaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tādṛśasyāsya vedasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṭhanāt sarvakilbiṣaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.160'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadya eva vimuktaḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pātakī nātra saṃśayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>brāhmaṇasya vedādhikāraḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tādṛśasyāsya vedasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṭhane brāhmaṇasya vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.161'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhikāro na cānyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃskṛtasyaiva karmabhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatrāpi pariśuddhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtanityakriyasya vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.162'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāpi pariśuddhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśeṣeṣu dineṣvapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śuddhācchuddhaḥ svato vedas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taduccāraṇataḥ kṣaṇāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.163'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devanāmānyanantāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nikhilānyaghahāni vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asakṛtpaṭhitāni syur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nātra kāryā vicāraṇā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.164'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>snānaṃ kṛtvā prārabhecca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vedaṃ taṃ tādṛśaṃ śivam</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='22'/>
	    <note type='subheading'>asnātvārambhe</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadyasnātvaiva mohena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prārabhet pātakī bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.165'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>snānataḥ sarvakarmāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sidhyantyeva na saṃśayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>sarvaṃ snānamūlam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>snānamūlamidaṃ brāhmaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>snānamūlamidaṃ tapaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.166'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>snānamūlākhilā yajñāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>snānamūlamidaṃ jagat</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvakṛtyevu sarvatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>snānameva paraṃ matam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.167'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtsneṣvaśuciṣu snānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tārakaṃ parikīrtitam</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>aspṛśyasparśanādikarmāṅgasnānam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aspṛśyasparśane caivam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhakṣyāṇāṃ ca bhakṣaṇe</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.168'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sakalīkaraṇe cātra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>malinīkaraṇe tathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apātrīkaraṇe 'nyatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātibhraṃśakarādiṣu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.169'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sūtakādiṣu sarveṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarveṣvāśaucakarmasu</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>snānameva paraṃ proktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvakṛchravratādiṣu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.170'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvādyanteṣu satreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadeva parikīrtitam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhojyabhojaneṣvevaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>snānaṃ tatsamudāhṛtam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.171'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akāryakaraṇeṣveṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukhyasnānāni mukhyataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaveyurhi pavitrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tānīmāni tataḥ sadā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.172'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caredyatnena śudhyarthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na cetkiṃ vātra śudhyati</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>vamane snānam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svakriyāvamane sadyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>savāsā jalamāviśet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='23'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.173'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ajīrṇavamane snānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>auṣadhādikriyāvaśāt</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>vamane snānābhāvasthalam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vamane 'pyavagāhaḥ syān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>makṣikāmūlato yadi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.174'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāvagāhaḥ prakartavyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tallepakṣālanaṃ param</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakartavyaṃ prayatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhāraṇaṃ śuddhavāsasām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>śākamūlādivamane</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.175'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śākairmūlaiḥ phalaiḥ patraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṭutiktarasādibhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadyaścedvamanaṃ tanna</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cirakāle tu tadbhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.176'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā cedrogavamanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadā snānaṃ vidhānataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadya eva prakartavyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aghamarṣavidhānataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>rātrau vamane</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.177'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rātrau tu vamane jāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rogādyairapyajīrṇataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ardharātrādadhastūṣṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāthasi snānamucyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.178'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatparaṃ prātareva syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti śākalabhāṣitam</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>svagotratyāge 'nyagotraparigrahaṇe</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svīyagotraparityāgād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyagotraparigrahāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.179'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prabhavetpatitaḥ sadyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śuddhaḥ saṃskārataḥ punaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svīyagotraparityāgo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhinnagotraparigrahaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.180'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvayametatprakathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>striya eva hi nurna tu</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='24'/>
	    <note type='subheading'>ardhodayaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arkaśrutivyatīpāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktā 'mā puṣyamāvayoḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.181'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asāvardhodayo yogaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>koṭyarkagrahasaṃnibhaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmin snāto cāpakoṭau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuryānsnānaśataṃ yadi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.182'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>triṃśadvarṣaṃ tyaktapitṛ</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>karmā śuddho bhavettataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahodaye tu tatsnāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasraṃ yadi bhaktitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.183'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kuryādvā kārayedvāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śuddhaḥ pūrvāghato bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyathā niṣkṛtirnāsti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tādṛśasyāsya pāpinaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.184'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ yogaṃ susamīkṣyeta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmāttādṛktu kilbiṣī</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>patyanyena citārohitāyāḥ putrasya kṛtyam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi sādhvī pramādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patyanyena citi vrajet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.185'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃ tatkarmakaraṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paścāttajjātajanmanām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti cintāparā devā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>babhūyuḥ kila vai ciram</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.186'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paścādudabhavadvāṇī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divyā spaṣṭapadākṣarā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patyanyanarayogasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣaḍabdaṃ kṛcchramucyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.187'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mohāt prāṇaparityāge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāpāpasya karmaṇaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyāḥ ṣaḍabdaṃ saṃproktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣaḍguṇenaiva saṃyutam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.188'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadānenaiva kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lobhaśāṭhyavivarjitam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taddoṣaśamanāyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāṇatyāgākhyakarmaṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='25'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.189'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cāpāgrayānaṃ kṛtvādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra snānaśataṃ caret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pakṣamātraṃ prayatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nityaṃ priyapuraḥsaram</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.190'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tacchāntistena nānyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sārdhasāhasramajjanaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brāhmaṇānāṃ prasādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kūṣmāṇḍagaṇapāṭhataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.191'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nityaṃ trivāraṃ tatraiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paścāttu prākṛtaṃ caret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ śuddhā bhavetsā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tairetaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>jātibhedena niṣkṛtiḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.192'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dviguṇaṃ rājayogena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>triguṇaṃ vaiśyayogataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catugurṇaṃ śūdrayogād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>evaṃ niṣkṛtirīritā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>striyaḥ punarvivāhe</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.193'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punarvivāhitā mūḍhaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛbhrātṛmukhaiḥ khalaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi sā te 'khilāḥ sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>syurvai nirayagāminaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.194'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punarvivāhitā sā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahārauravabhāginī</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatpatiḥ pitṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kālasūtragato bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.195'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dātā cāṅgāraśayana</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāmakaṃ pratipadyate</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>tasya niṣkṛtiḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taddoṣaśamanāyātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaścittamidaṃ param</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.196'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dātā setugataḥ sadyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhanuṣkoṭyāṃ samāhitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nityaṃ triṣavaṇasnāyī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāvakāhāra eva vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.197'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃvatsaraṃ prayatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasedevānvahaṃ tarām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svakṛtaṃ yacca tatpāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vadannityanvahan yatan</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.198'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarveṣvapi ca tīrtheṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taptakṛcchraśataṃ caret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ śuddho bhavedevaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>voḍhā cāpi tadā punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='26'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.199'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taddoṣaśamanāyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puṇyaṃ cāndrāyaṇatrayam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatnātkurvan vasettatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṛtutrayamatandritaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.200'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratinityaṃ pañcagavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pibaṃstadvidhinā rudan</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirlajjayā lokapuraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kūṣmāṇḍādīn paṭhaṃstathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.201'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>drupadāṃ nāma gāyatrīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gāyatrīṃ vedamātaram</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃdhyātraye sahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>japaṃstaptākhyakaṃ śivam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.202'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛcchraṃ vidhānataḥ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punaḥsaṃskārataḥ punaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puṭagarbhavidhānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śuddho bhavati tatra cet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.203'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cettaptaśataṃ kuryāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punarupanayātparam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā cedbhartṛdvayaṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>setusnānasahasrakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.204'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtvā ca yāvakāhārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṣamātreṇa śudhyati</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadyaputrā putriṇī cet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patedevāśu taiḥ saha</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.205'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā vai putraistadudbhūtaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caṇḍālatvaṃ bhajeta vai</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>bhrāntyā putrikādivivāhe jāte svamātraśuddhiḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi svasāraṃ tanayāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cirādbhrāntyādikṛcchrataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.206'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vivahenmohato jñāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtvā cāndrasahasrakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cāpāgrayānataḥ paścāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puṭagarbhavidhānataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.207'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>karaṇājjātakādīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svamātrasya śucirbhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pareṣāṃ śūdratulyo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatastāṃ bibhṛyādapi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='27'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.208'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pūrvadharmaṃ vinikṣipya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyāṃ bhaktyā japanvaset</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>putre jāte</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi tasyāṃ prajāyeraṃs</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāṃścaṇḍāleṣu vinyaset</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.209'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ svayaṃ ca nityaṃ vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvakāśī caredbhuvam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāpaprakhyāpanaṃ kurvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāvajjīvaṃ hariṃ bhajan</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.210'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puṇyakṣetreṣu niyataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasan bhaktyā rasāmaṭet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vivāhitāṃ ca vidhavāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāmohena vañcakaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.211'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dattāṃ vivāhya tajjñātvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadyaścaṇḍālatāṃ vrajet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taddoṣaśamanāyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvavattu samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.212'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dviguṇaṃ nikhilaṃ kṛtyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samunneyaṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>ekadvitricatuḥpañcavāraṃ vivāhitā</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekadvitricatuḥpañca</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāraṃ vai yā vivāhitā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.213'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atikṣudraikakāleṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāpaikabahuleṣu ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñātā cettu tāṃ samyak</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭvā gatvā vicārya ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.214'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tattvaṃ tasyāstu vijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaścittaṃ tataścaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatra yatra ca sā gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yaṃ yaṃ vā svajanaiḥ saha</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.215'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māyayā mohayāmāsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vañcayitvāticaryayā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṃ taṃ jñātvā ca saṃbhāṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tattadvāṅmūlamapyalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='28'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.216'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutvā paścācchrotriyebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāvayitvākhilaṃ tataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājñe bandhuni vāvedya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaścittaṃ tataścaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.217'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etādṛśeṣu kṛtyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā kṣetraṃ prabhaveddhruvam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prathamodvāhakasyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paraṃ tveṣā parā na tu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.218'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadāciddharmakṛtyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na tasyāpi parasya vā</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>tadapekṣayā veśyā viśiṣyate</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā bhogamātrayogyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>veśyā tasyā viśiṣyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.219'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā cetteṣu kṛtyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sapaṅktau bhojanaṃ tathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saha vā bhojanaṃ duṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yadi pātityakārakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.220'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tacchudhyarthaṃ rasāyāṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvabhre saṃchādya dharmataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khanitvā yāmamātraṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ghaṭikādvayameva vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.221'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāduddhṛtya paścāttu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātakādi samācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taptakṛcchrasahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmataśca samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.222'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niyatātmā yāvakāśī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cāpāgraṃ tadbhavecchuciḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pañca snānasahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayaṃ vipramukhena vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.223'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samācarettataḥ svasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śuddho bhavati kevalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na pareṣāmayaṃ yogya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>evamāha purā bhṛguḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.224'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praviṣṭaparakāyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi saṃyogamāpnuyāt</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trimāsayāvakāhārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhvī śudhyati nānyathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.225'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praviṣṭaparavarṣmāṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vijñātaṃ svapatiṃ satī</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prapālayedviśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ratimātraṃ na cācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='29'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.226'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāyayoreva saṃbandhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purā saṃskṛtayoḥ purā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nātmanorasti saṃbandho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhinnakāye na cettataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.227'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ātmānyakāyaṃ spṛśyenna</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena pātityamāpnuyāt</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>surāṇāmapi caivaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manuṣyāṇāṃ tu kiṃ punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>agrāhyamūrtayo grāhyamūrtayaśca</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.228'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>agrāhyābhedyamūrtīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grāhmabhaidyaśarīriṇām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devānāṃ sumahābhedas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāratamyaṃ ca tatparam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.229'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>spaṣṭameva prabhavati</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tenāgrāhyāḥ surāstu ye</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>grāhyakāyasurāṇāṃ vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prapūjyāḥ paramāḥ param</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.230'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhikā vandanīyāśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>te na nīcāstu tena vai</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>agrāhyamūrtinivedyam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tanniveditamatyarthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na teṣāṃ parikalpayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.231'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenāparādhaḥ sumahān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhavenna tathācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agrāhyābhedyamūrtīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>grāhyabhedyaniveditam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.232'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayogyaṃ satataṃ syāddhi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūdrasyeva śrutiryathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrautasmārtakriyādakṣaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paitṛkoddeśato 'pi vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.233'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niruptamanyoddeśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na devāya nivedayet</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='30'/>
	    <note type='subheading'>niveditenāniveditayojane</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niveditena rucyarthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yojayennāniveditam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.234'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā niveditaṃ bhūyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lavaṇaṃ ca niyojayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivedanādatha punas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadādāya ghṛtena vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.235'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tailena lavaṇenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatnena na niyojayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taducchiṣṭaṃ na kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatkareṇa na pīḍayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.236'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na khaṇḍayenmitho 'jñānān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na tatprokṣaṇamācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pariṣiñcennaivameva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tūṣṇīmāsye vinikṣipet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.237'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhṇīyāttu tadantarvai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na dantairapi pīḍayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadetatparamaṃ śuddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirmālyamatidurlabham</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.238'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devānāmapi tadbhojyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayatnenātibhaktitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadopadaṃśaṃ svīkuryān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niveditamahākṣaṇe</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>bhagavatprasādagrahaṇe bhakṣaṇaviṣaye</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.239'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niveditasya haviṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhakṣaṇe samupasthite</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āpośanaṃ na kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prokṣaṇaṃ pariṣecanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.240'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi kurvīta mohena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rauravaṃ narakaṃ vrajet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>annaṃ pakvāt samuddhṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛthakpātre niyujya ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.241'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtvā sukhoṣṇaṃ saṃskṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paścācchākhādibhiryajet</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>atyuṣṇādinivedane</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asahyoṣṇaṃ mahoṣṇaṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pakvapātragamaiva vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.242'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo nivedayate mohād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devāya narakī bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='31'/>
	    <note type='subheading'>nivedanaprakasaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmādannaṃ samuddhṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛthakpātre nidhāya ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.243'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtvā yatnātsukhoṣṇaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rāśi kṛtvābhighārya ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atiśuddhamatiśreṣṭhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājayogyaṃ suśobhanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.244'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śākabhakṣyaphalopetaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devāya vinivedayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadannamapi yatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścāddadyātsamāhitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.245'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aprokṣyāpariṣicyaivam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aprāṇāhutipūrvakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ucchiṣṭamapyakṛtvaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatnāddadyātsvayaṃ śuciḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>svīkāraprakāraḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.246'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niveditāni vastūni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na dantaiḥ parighaṭṭayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na khaṇḍayecchabdayecca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ tu tūṣṇīṃ tadambuvat</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.247'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rasavatphalavadyatnāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāśayecca na śabdayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaṇṭhato vāpi yatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāṣṭhabhūtaphalānyapi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>arbhakebhyo dadyāt</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.248'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pradadyādarbhakebhyo vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na svīkuryātsvayaṃ yadi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svīkuryāttu tadā naktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upaviṣṭaḥ śucisthale</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.249'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śabdānajanayanneva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmudantādibhirhyadan</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>guhasthasya rātrāvuṣṇodakasnānam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhī na rātrau snāyīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yadi snāyīta vāriṇā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='32'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.250'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uṣṇena bhavane vipra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sākṣito vahnisākṣitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uṣṇena śakto na snāyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aśaktaścettadācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>abhyaṅgam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.251'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhyaktaśca tathā snāyāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>charīrārogyahetave</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatsnānaṃ kathitaṃ sadbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na nityaṃ tena nācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.252'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>karma naimittikaṃ tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devānāmapi nārcanam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvannityādikarmaughaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvatyaiva vidhānataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.253'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paścādabhyañjanasnānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na cetkāle tu madhyame</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madhyāhne saṃgave vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>snānaṃ kṛtvā tu tādṛśam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>mādhyāhnikasnānam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.254'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mādhyaṃdinasya kṛtyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punaḥsnānaṃ yathāvidhi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtvā tatprārabhetkarma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tenaitatkarma nācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.255'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>malāpakarṣaṇārthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taddhi snānaṃ prakīrtitam</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>kṣurasnānam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evameva kṣurasnānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karmāyogyaṃ pracakṣate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.256'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣurasnānātparaṃ yastu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punaḥ snānāntaraṃ vinā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karoti vaidikaṃ karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tatphalamavāpnuyāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.257'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavedapi pratyavāyī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathāto nācaredbudhaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='33'/>
	    <note type='subheading'>prātaḥsāyaṃparvādiṣvabhyañjanasnānam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nābhyañjanaṃ prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prātaḥsāyaṃ na parvasu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.258'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>grahaṇe śrāddhakāleṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vrateṣu nikhileṣvapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puṇyavaidikadīkṣāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na naktaṃ kṣetratīrthayoḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.259'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suptvā bhuktvā ruditvā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūraṃ gatvā pipāsitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atikṣudhāturo rogī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kurvīta kathaṃcana</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.260'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akṛtvā nityakarmāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chardayitvātitāḍitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaptaḥ śapitvā vyājena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ghātayitvā narān parān</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.261'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hṛtvā dhanāni dīnānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na kuryāttattu sarvadā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svajanān preṣayitvā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nyakkṛtya gurubāndhavān</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.262'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadavaśyakakṛtyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kartavyatvena śāstrataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahatsūpasthiteṣveva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tānyakṛtvaiva maurkhyataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.263'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na kuryādeva sahasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vigrahodvartanaṃ dvijaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>abhyañjanasnānaṃ sodakumbhanāndīśrāddhayoḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sodakumbhaśrāddhamātraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtvābhyañjanataḥ param</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.264'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kuryādeveti hārīto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>naivāneneti vai manuḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>snātasnānena kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na śrāddhāni kadācana</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='34'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.265'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāndiṃ tābhyāṃ prakurvītā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>-nukalpenaiva tatsmṛtam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>snānamabhyañjanaṃ snānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aśaktasya kadācana</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.266'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sodakumbhasya nāndyāśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kartuḥ saṃpadyate kila</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>krośasthitanadīsnānācchrāddham</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krośasthitanadīsnānān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na pitroḥ śrāddhamācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.267'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahādavabhṛthāccāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāvādvārṣāvagāhataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadaṅgasnānataḥ sadyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhākhyaṃ karma taccaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>saṃkalpaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.268'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>karmamātrasya sarvatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṇānāyamya mantrataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kariṣya iti vāgukti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpaṃ saṃkalpamācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.269'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na saṃkalpaṃ vinā karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nityakāmyādikaṃ caret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa mānasaḥ syātsaṃkalpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kartavyo vācikaḥ paraḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.270'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasya ityetadvākyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā prāha śrutiḥ śivā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>deśaḥ kālaśca saṃkalpe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaktavyau tatra cetpunaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.271'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tithiḥ kāla iti prokto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyatyāse tasya karma tat</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naṣṭameva bhavetsadyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmāttattu punaścaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>pitṛśrāddhavyatyāse punaścaret</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.272'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekasminneva divase</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitroḥ śrāddhamupasthitam</seg> /</l>
