	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatkrameṇaiva kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyatyāse tu punaścaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.273'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mohādataddinakṛta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāddhaṃ cāpi punaścaret</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='35'/>
	    <note type='subheading'>śūnyatithikṛtaṃ punaścaret</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā śūnyatithau yatnāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtaṃ cāpi punaścaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.274'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sūtakānte śūnyatithi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>doṣo 'yaṃ śrāddhakarmaṇaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kadācinna bhavatyeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmāttatraiva taccaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>pitṛśrāddhātparaṃ kāruṇyaśrāddham</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.275'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pituḥ śrāddhātparaṃ śrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāruṇyānāṃ samācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadanyathākṛtaṃ taccet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paredyustatpunaścaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.276'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nimittagrahaṇaśrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtvānnenāpi taddinam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhūyaḥ samyak prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhissayaiva na cānyathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>mātṛpitṛśrāddhamekadine 'nnena</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.277'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitrormṛtāhaṃ satatam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>api kṛcchragato naraḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>annenaiva prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāmādyena kadācana</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.278'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>grahaṇādiṣu śaktaśced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhissayā tāni cācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na cedāmādinā śuddhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taddharmairakhilairvṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.279'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>grahe muhūrtadvitaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gate 'nnaśrāddhamācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>api śakto 'pi tannyūne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tādṛk chrāddhaṃ na cācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>cākrikaśrāddham</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.280'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cākrikaṃ grahaṇaṃ mukhyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āyanaṃ tadamukhyakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puṣpavanmaṇḍalasama</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>madhyabhāgaprapīḍitam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='36'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.281'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yannīlalakṣmapṛthulaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vartulaṃ tattriyāmagam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taccākrikamiti proktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>grahaṇaṃ pitṛtṛptidam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.282'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tacca pañcaśatābdānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekadā vai bhaviṣyati</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>grahaṇaṃ bhojananiṣedhaḥ, bṛddhabālāturāṇāṃ na</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>grahasya cākrikasyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvaṃ yāmatrayaṃ naraiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.283'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhojanaṃ naiva kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bṛddhabālāturānvinā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aparāhne na madhyāhne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madhyāhne na tu saṃgave</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.284'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃgave tu na tu prātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛthukānāṃ tu kevalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>stanyapāne na doṣo 'sti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatkāle kevale 'pi vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.285'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yavāgvāḥ payaso vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pānīyasyāśaratsamam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niyamo 'yaṃ prakathito</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tadūrdhvaṃ tu taccaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.286'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayanagrahaṇe mukhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paunaḥpunyagate sakṛt</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>koṇaikadeśasaṃspṛṣṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tannyūnasamayasthite</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.287'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāmadvayaṃ sārdhayāma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvayaṃ yāmatrayaṃ tathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sārdhayāmatrayaṃ yāma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>catuṣṭayamiti kramāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.288'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhikāraprabhedena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhojanasya nirūpaṇam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadetattasya sarvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravadāmi vinirṇayam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.289'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatkālājīrṇarāhitye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hṛdayaṃ tannibodhata</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='37'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ sthitaṃ punarvacmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāmataḥ sārdhayāmataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.290'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jīrṇaśaktimato nuścet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatkāle kṣudbhavedyadi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na doṣaḥ kathitaḥ sadbhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadāciddaivayogataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.291'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ajīrṇaḥ syāttadā doṣaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sumahān prabhavedapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmādyāmadvayaṃ sarvair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhuktistyājyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>atyantāturādīnām</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.292'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśeṣaḥ ko 'pi bhūyaśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>procyate sumahān paraḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rogiṇo 'pyatimātrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cauṣadhātikṣudaśnataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.293'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krūragrahātitaptasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>piśācāveśinastathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaśyākarṣaṇavidveṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>stambhanoccāṭanādibhiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.294'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pīḍitasya viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūrchitasyātitāḍanaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatkālabhakṣaṇamapi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na duṣyati kadācana</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.295'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atyutkrāntipravṛttasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciratyaktāndhasastathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aprāśanotpannamṛti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃśayasya viśeṣataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.296'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatkālabhakṣaṇāvṛttir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na doṣāya bhavedayam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarveṣāmapi varṇānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvāśramanivāsinām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.297'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mukhyo sādhāraṇo dharmas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatkālājīrṇaśūnyatā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāmatrayādikāḥ kālās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra tatra pracoditāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.298'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taistaiste nikhilā jñeyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛbhedena vivakṣitāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='38'/>
	    <note type='subheading'>grastāstake sakāminiṣkāminoḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>somaṃ grastāstagaṃ sūryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>api vā śāstradṛṣṭitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.299'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muktaṃ jñātvā tataḥ snātvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣkāmo bhojanaṃ caret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śubhrāṃśucaṇḍāṃśuloka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāmī cenna tu bhojanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.300'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caredeva na saṃdehas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tallokākāminaḥ param</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>doṣāya bhojanatyāga</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>evamāha prajāpatiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>agnihotram</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.301'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vihitasya parityāgād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>agnihotrasvarūpiṇaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pītamātṛstanaraso</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>janakāśaucamocane</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.302'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sahiṣṇurna bhavettasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatpūrvaṃ tatsamācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>dattaputraḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārānnyak sodarasutas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tarṇakaḥ karmavarjitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.303'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtakarmatrayakṛto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yo dattaḥ pravaraḥ smṛtaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>mātāpitṛbhyāṃ dānaṃ grahaṇaṃ ca</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dadyātāṃ dampatī putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhṇīyātāṃ ca dampatī</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.304'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayorevādhikāro 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taddāne tatpratigrahe</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brāhmaṇānāṃ sapiṇḍeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kartavyaḥ putrasaṃgrahaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.305'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sagotreṣvathavā kāryo hy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyatra tu na kārayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asaṃskṛto dattasūnuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pituścāpyakṛtakriyaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.306'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na taddhanamavāpnoti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadvṛttau kā kathā punaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='39'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātakarmādinā tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putratvaṃ nānyathā matam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.307'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mauñjyantenātiharṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvamatyā samantrataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putro jñātimato dattaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtasarvapitṛkriyaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.308'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi svayaṃ tadā sarvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadvṛttiṃ labhate parām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvasya pratimantrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitṛhetuprapāṭhanāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.309'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dattasya tadbhūlābhaḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatpūrvaṃ sā na sidhyati</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hiraṇyakakṣyāmantrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṭhanāttattrayaṃ punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.310'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pradūrīkṛtya tajjñātīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avaśādeti cākhilam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattasūnuḥ pitrānyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃskṛto yadi tadvṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.311'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadā tu taddhanaṃ sarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jñātisādhāraṇaṃ bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayameva piturdattaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karma kuryātprayatnataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.312'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taddhanaṃ tu na cetsadyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tajjñātigatameva vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>datto 'yamasagotraścet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadā durbala eva vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.313'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavedeva na saṃdehaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāstre 'mutra paratra ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi jāmī tatra bhavet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanmukhaṃ nāvalokayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>avaśyaṃ putrasaṃgrahaḥ kartavyaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.314'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathākathaṃcitputrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃgrahaḥ kārya eva vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daurbalye svasya saṃjāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmajñena mahātmanā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.315'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jalabudbudasaṃkāśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṣmaitatkathitaṃ budhaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='40'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi pramāṇaṃ jantūnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uttarakṣaṇajīvane</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.316'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmādātmahitaṃ nityaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cintayanneva taccaret</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>aputrasya loko nāsti</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāputrasya tu loko 'sti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putriṇastu triviṣṭapam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.317'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahmalokādayo lokāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svādhīnā eva sarvadā</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>putravānagnimān</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putravānagnimānnityaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putravān śrotriyaḥ smṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.318'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putrī sākṣādbrahmavicca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putravāneva bhāgyavān</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ye ye dharmāḥ svena te te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putreṇaitena tatkṣaṇāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.319'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃpāditā bhaviṣyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nātra kāryā vicāraṇā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na putravānapatnīkaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ tu so 'yamaputravān</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.320'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anagniko na putrī syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aputro 'nagnimān smṛtaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putreṇa sthāvaraṃ dānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phalavaddānameva ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.321'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadyalloke mahatsarvair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>durlabhaṃ putriṇī caret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putrayatraṃ sadā kuryād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaidikaṃ laukikaṃ śubham</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.322'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmādṛtumatīṃ bhāryāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadā svastho na laṅghayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>laṅghayedyadi tāṃ mūḍho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhrūṇahatyāmavāpnuyāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='41'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.323'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛtusnātadine so 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuvā śrotriya eva vā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kavyāya bhavedeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putravān yadi tadbhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>jātamātre putramukhavīkṣaṇam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.324'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putreṇa jātamātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṇānmukto bhavedayam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmātputrasya jātasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyetsadyo mukhaṃ pumān</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.325'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na paśyatastallapanam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṇānmuktirna jāyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena kena prakāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmātkurvīta mānavaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.326'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putrasaṃpādanaṃ dhīmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>durbalaścedviśeṣataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>vṛttidattādayaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛttidattaṃ kalpayedvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mauñjīdattamathāpi vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.327'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vivāhadattamathavā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yajñadattaṃ na cetparam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛttidattaḥ kulānyaṣṭau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mauñjīdattastu ṣoḍaśa</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.328'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vivāhadatto dvātriṃśad</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yajñadattastariṣyati</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catuḥṣaṣṭikulānyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>līlayā sadya eva vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.329'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aputradattavṛtyā yaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṇavṛttiṃ caratyalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛttidatta iti khyātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanayaḥ puṇyalokakṛt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.330'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhanato yasya yo loke hy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upanīto bhavedaho</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa mauñjidatta ityākhyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanayastu tato 'dhikaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.331'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evameva bhavedanyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanayaḥ paralokadaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vivāhadattasaṃjñaḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato 'pi dviguṇaḥ paraḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.332'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato 'dhiko yajñadattas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanayaḥ pitṛvallabhaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ta ete tanayāḥ sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tattatkarmaikapūrtaye</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='42'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.333'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtena dhanadānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavanti kila nānyathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmātsantaḥ kilaiteṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karmaṇāmekato dhanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.334'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na gṛhṇanti mahātmāno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paralokadidṛkṣavaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaṇaśaḥ kaṇaśaḥ sadbhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratigṛhya tatastataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.335'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śanaiḥ śanaiśca kālena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahatā tāni cācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ kṛteṣu teṣveṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahatsu kila karmasu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.336'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>naikasya tanayāste syus</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmātteṣu tathācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>anyeṣu sutagrahaṇam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durlabhe tu sagotreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapiṇḍeṣu sute yadi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.337'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sutaṃ bandhuṣu vānyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhṇīyādanyajātiṣu</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>savarṇeṣu grahaṇam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>savarṇeṣveva kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsavarṇeṣu tadgraham</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.338'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asavarṇeṣu tatkurvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadyaḥ patati varṇataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>asagotrasvīkṛtau</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhīta asagotraścet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanayaḥ puruṣatrayam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.339'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtārthatāṃ prāpayati</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatkulaṃ tadanantaram</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃkīrṇamavaśādyāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatnataścettariṣyati</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.340'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asagotrastu na grāhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītuḥ syātsa eva hi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>datto rikthamavāpnoti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>santatirdātureva hi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.341'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāddattasutaḥ svasva</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanayānudbhavān tataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>janakasyaiva gotre tān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mauñjyāṃ mantraiḥ praveśayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='43'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.342'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi dattasvatanayān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svagotre na praveśayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattajo vātha tajjo vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadgotradvayajāstu te</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>vivāhe gotradvayatyāgaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.343'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ satyatra janane</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātānāṃ pāṇipīḍane</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāgate tadā samyag</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatnādgotradvayaṃ tyajet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.344'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadgotradvayayuktyartha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jñānāya kila tatparam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tajjātānāṃ vivāhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadārṣadvayamācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>abhivandanādau dvigotratvam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.345'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nityābhivandane sandhyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vandane kāmyavandane</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtsnārṣeyaṃ tvekagotre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parasminnapi gotrake</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.346'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svīkṛtyārṣadvayaṃ tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yojayitvā tataḥ param</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekameva vadedgotram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ekadvitryārṣakaṃ tathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.347'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pañcasaptārṣakaṃ vaitan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>navaikādaśakārṣakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gotramekaṃ bhavedevaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trayodaśakamārṣakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.348'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ pañcadaśārṣaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gotraṃ tatprabhavedapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ jātāni gotrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dattāvṛttyudbhavāni vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.349'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vartante bhūtale tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gotriṇastānvicārya ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛṣṭvā tatsaṃśayastyājya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etāvantyeva bhūtale</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.350'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gotrāṇi śāstrasiddhāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caikārṣeyāṇi kānicit</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='44'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvyārṣeyāṇi tryārṣeyāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañcārṣeyāṇi santi hi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.351'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāvantyeva sarvatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāstrasiddhāni netarat</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādyadattaikataddatta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāramparyeṇa kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.352'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛśyante brāhmaṇāḥ sapta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>daśārṣeyāvadhītare</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>dattajādīnāṃ pūrvagotram</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmāddattajaputrāstān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvagotre praveśayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.353'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vinā praveśaṃ yadi te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paraṃ prāptaikagotriṇaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi syurmohataḥ paścāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvaṃ tajjanakasya ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.354'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gotraṃ varjyaṃ vivāhādāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>evaṃ satyatra kālataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ajñātvā pūrvavṛttāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gotre tajjanakasya ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.355'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vivaheran mahānarthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhavetkila kevalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrvavṛtte 'tha vijñāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāṃ tyaktvā mātṛvattu tām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.356'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pālayedeva dharmeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paścātkṛcchratrayaṃ caret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taddoṣaparihārāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra jātāstu cettataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.357'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caṇḍāleṣveva niṣkampaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yojayediti nirṇayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asagotrasutaṃ tasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na svīkuryātkathaṃcana</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.358'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>buddhimān dharmavitkiṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paurvāparyaviśeṣavit</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sagotreṣveva kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāstrataḥ putrasaṃgraham</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='45'/>
	  <note type='subheading'>bhrātṛjeṣu na vivāhahomādiḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.359'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrātṛjeṣu vivāho na</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na svīkāraśca satkriyā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na homādiśca kāryo vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāṅmātreṇaiva putratā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>bhrātṛputrādiparigrahaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.360'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrātṛputreṣu tiṣṭhatsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānyaṃ jñātijanaṃ tathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na svīkuryāddūragaṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svīkṛtaścora eva saḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.361'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putragrahaṇakāle tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatpitrormānasaṃ tadā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>toṣayitvā pradānādyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaviṣyatkālakṛtyakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.362'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtvā ca śapathaṃ bāḍhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bandhurājādibhirjanaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatputrasya ca maryādā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caivamityapi vai punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.363'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jāte 'pi caurase bhūyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karomyevaṃ na saṃśayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛḍhayitvā svayaṃ paścāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svīkuryāttanayaṃ tataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.364'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ceddoṣo mahāneva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>svīkṛtyanantaramaurasotpattau</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svīkṛtya paraputraṃ yaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃjāte tvaurase punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.365'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puroktānyanyathākṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mohāttadahitaṃ caran</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pralapaṃstadduruktāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mama māstvayamadya vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.366'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vadetpāpī mahākrūras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena bhūrbhāravatyalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṃ deśāddhārmiko rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāḍayitvā pravāsayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='46'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.367'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvasvaṃ tasya gṛhṇīyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmin janapade na cet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na varṣetkila parjanyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāṣṭrakṣobho 'pi jāyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>putrapradānasamaye yaduktaṃ tatkartavyam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.368'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putrapradānasamaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatpitrorgrāhakeṇa yā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāguktā tāṃ tataḥ kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tiraskartuṃ na śakyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.369'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadbandhubhistena rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tairjanairdātṛdāpakaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadbhāryābhistattanayair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena kenāpi vā punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.370'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putrapradānasamaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>proktavākyaṃ tu tatparam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alpaṃ mahadaśakyaṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śakyaṃ vā tanna laṅghayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.371'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svakāryāya purā proktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>janānāṃ purato dṛḍham</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>icchaṃstadanyathayituṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatate yastu yā jaḍā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.372'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ūrdhvaṃ lokaṃ na yāto vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrūṇahatyāmavāpnutaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>bhartuḥ piturvā vākyātikrame</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svaputrahitamicchantyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartṛvākyaṃ puroditam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.373'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tiraskurvanti sahasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tā vai nirayabhājinaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhartuḥ piturvā yadvākyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā pūrvamudīritam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.374'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>patnī putro 'thavā maurkhyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anṛtaṃ maurkhyacoditam</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='47'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥśrutaṃ paruṣaṃ krūram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmatkāryavirodhi tat</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.375'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāpyakurma svīkaraṇam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti vaktḥn durātmanaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nyakkṛtya vācā dhikkṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāḍayitvā kapolayoḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.376'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śīghraṃ pravāsayeddeśāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādhūn samyak prapūjayet</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>bhrātṛputrasvīkṛtau dattasya samāṃśaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svīkṛtabhrātṛsūnośca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścājjātaurasasya ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.377'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samabhāgaḥ sadā proktas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadanyasya punaryadi</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>sagotrasya turīyabhāgaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>turyabhāgaḥ sagotrāder</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>evamāha pitāmahaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.378'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>auraso vayasā nyūno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jyeṣṭha eva na saṃśayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naṣṭe tu pālake tāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svīkṛto vayasādhikaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.379'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upanītaḥ kalatrī vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātaputro 'thavā yajan</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatnācca taṃ nopanayed</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>datto jātaṃ tadaurasam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.380'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaniṣṭho dharmato datto hy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apyayaṃ vayasādhikaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nyūno 'pi vayasā jyeṣṭhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>auraso nātra saṃśayaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>dattanaurase upanīte</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.381'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāddattaḥ svayaṃ paścāj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātaṃ dharmeṇa pūrvajam</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='48'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmanyūno nopanayed</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yadi mohena tādṛśam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.382'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pramādena hyupanayet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>syātāṃ tau patitau dhruvam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tayordvandvabhāvo 'sti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadācittu parasparam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>mṛtabhāryayatyādiputragrahaṇam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.383'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛtabhāryo yatirvarṇī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśvastā dūrabhartṛkā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putraṃ na pratigṛhṇīyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūrabhāryo 'pi sūtakī</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.384'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhikāro militayor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dampatyorubhayorapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kadācinna pṛthaktvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taddāne tatpratigrahe</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.385'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sūtiprajananasthānā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pannayugmadvayasya cet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vastuno melanaṃ putra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dānaṃ tadgrahaṇaṃ bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.386'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sūtiprajananasthāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yugmadvandvamanaḥsukham</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>acañcalaṃ sthiraṃ tuṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cenmanastaccarennanu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.387'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dampatī dampatīcittaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tuṣṭaṃ kṛtvāmbarādibhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtvā ca śapathaṃ gāḍhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaviṣyatkāryahetave</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.388'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sākṣiṇāṃ purato nūnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devabrāhmaṇasannidhau</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājñe bandhuni cāvedya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhṇīyātāṃ sutaṃ tataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>tatkāle pratijñāya tadakaraṇe</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.389'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śapathānantaraṃ kālān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maryādā yā kṛtā purā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>narāstānullaṅghayata</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājā rāṣṭrātpravāsayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='49'/>
	  <note type='subheading'>patnīṣu sutasvīkārakāle yā sannihitā sā mātā, anyā sapatnīmātā</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.390'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sutasvīkaraṇe yā ''rāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthitā sā 'mbāsya vai bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāpatnī jananī dūra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthitā bhavati nānyathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>anye mātṛmātāmahādayaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.391'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dve tisro vā sthitāścettu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadārādeva kevalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putragrahaṇatuṣṭyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartrā sākaṃ hṛdā tayā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.392'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nikhilā mātaro jñeyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahumātṛka eva saḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadānīṃ svīkṛtasuto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nātra kāryā vicāraṇā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.393'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāsāṃ ca pitaraḥ sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>'pyasya mātāmahāḥ smṛtāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvaśrāddheṣvanenātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvān mātāmahān kramāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.394'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekasminneva tatpiṇḍe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yojayedvā pṛthaktu vā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>piṇḍānvā nikṣipetteṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smartḥṇāmatra kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.395'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vacanānāṃ samatvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikalpastulya eva hi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathāruci prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā vā purataḥ kṛtam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.396'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathaiva paścātkurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvatraivaṃ hi nirṇayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>sapatnīpitā na mātāmahaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sapatnījananītāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tu mātāmaho bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>sapatnīmātṛtarpaṇam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.397'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sapatnījananī nitya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tarpaṇe dvañjalī labhet</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='50'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svamātṛvattyrañjaliṃ sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadācidapi no labhet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.398'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punarvivāhitenaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadbhāryā dvañjaliṃ labhet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aputrā vā saputrā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatsamā sā prakīrtitā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>tasyā aupāsanāgnau śrāddham</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.399'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyā aupāsane śrāddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>agnau kuryānna laukike</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi kuryātpramādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kulaṃ tasya vinaśyati</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>patnyā agniḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.400'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yataḥ patnīmṛtadinaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛnāśadinena vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tulyatvenaiva kathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyāḥ ko vā vimūḍhadhīḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.401'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>laukikāgnau prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svasamāyā vicakṣaṇaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā vidyamānā bhāryaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛtā cenmātṛvargagā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>bhrātṛputragrahaṇavidhiḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.402'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtatrayavivāhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>patnīṃ dṛṣṭvā ciraṃ pṛthak</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvādaśābdamalabhyaitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadrajodarśanātparam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.403'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putragrahaḥ prakathito</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukhyo 'yaṃ tadgrahe vidhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra sākṣātkaniṣṭhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutaścejjātamātrakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.404'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pravaraḥ kathitaḥ sadbhis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya vyavahitaśca cet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmānnyūno bhavetputra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>evaṃ dvitrivibhedataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='51'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.405'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrātuḥ putro bhavennyūnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadyaḥ stanyarasagrahāt</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paraṃ tadgrahaṇātputras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmānnyūnaḥ prajāyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.406'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamanyeṣu navasu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātahomātparaṃ pṛthak</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dinabhedena tannyūno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>datto bhavati putrakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.407'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato jyeṣṭhasya cetputras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tannyūno nātra saṃśayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na cāpyekadvitribhedād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhrātā vyavahito yadi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.408'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya sūnustathā nyūna</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>evameva punastvatha</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāpatnīmātṛtanayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>unneyā jyeṣṭhataḥ param</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.409'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tanayāḥ śāstramārgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nyūnā eva bhavanti te</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ pitṛvyatanaya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanayāśca pṛthagvidhāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.410'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tannyūnā eva kathitāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sagotrā evameva vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñeyāḥ kila kiṃ bhinna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gotrāścettu tataḥ punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.411'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ vācyamasti tajjñātvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhimān kāladeśakau</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samālocya vidhānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuryātputrasya saṃgraham</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>vibhāge bhrātarastulyāḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.412'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vibhāge bhrātarastulyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatputrāstatsamā hi yat</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te gṛhītvā na turyāśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tallabhante sutodbhave</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.413'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samameva labhante 'ṃśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aurasena samā hi te</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmapatnyāṃ samudbhūta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aurasaḥ kathito budhaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.414'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvitīyādisamudbhūto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na tatsāmyamavāpnuyāt</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='52'/>
	    <note type='subheading'>kāmajaputrāḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmapatnīsutaṃ prāhur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aurasaṃ brahmavādinaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.415'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvitīyādisutān sarvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāmajāniti cocire</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmapatnīsuto jyaiṣṭhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dattādgauravamāpnuyāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.416'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paścājjātaḥ kaniṣṭho 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvitīyādisutāstu cet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitryādikriyayā kālād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmapatnīsutaiḥ samāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.417'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavantyapi na saṃdehas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathāpi punarekakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravadāmi samudbhūtas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmāttatkāryakṛdbhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.418'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vayo 'dhiko dattasuto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na tatkārye prabhurbhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattasūnurdharmapatnyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sati tāte 'thavā na cet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.419'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvibhāryake kriyākṛccet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadbhāryāyā <orig>(</orig>athāpi vā<orig>)</orig></seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattasūnustayoranya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>tarasya yadi karmakṛt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.420'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satyaurase tatsamo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhavediti vai manuḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dauhitro yadi dattaḥ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhrātṛjo vā tathāvidhaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.421'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aurasenaiva tulitau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satataṃ dharmatatparau</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattasya pitarau proktau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>grāhakāveva saṃtatam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.422'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitṛtvamapi dattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tiṣṭhejjanakayorna tu</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dānahomātparaṃ tasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitarāvasya tau matau</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.423'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitṛtvamapi mātṛtvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekatraiva hi tiṣṭhati</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tiṣṭhati tadanyatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriyāśatasahasrakāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.424'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitṛtvaṃ mātari gatam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekaśeṣajamalpakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā na tatkāryakaraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātṛtvamapi tattathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='53'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.425'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitṛvyapatnyādīnāṃ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tādṛkpatnītvameva hi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāsāṃ bhavati tasmāttu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tanmātṛtvamuccaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.426'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prajāpatibhyo hyabhimānasūnuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛvyasūnustvathavā sagotraḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyeṣṭhaḥ kanīyānna bhavettathaiko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na bhinnagotro na sagotravidviṭ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.427'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sagotryasaṃmataḥ sūnur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaḥ kaścana samāgataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putratvenodaraparo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nābhimānasuto bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.428'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmapatnīsuto varṇī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvitīyādisuto gṛhī</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātaputro 'pyāhitāgnir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na samastena varṇinā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.429'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmapatnīsuto bālo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvitīyādisuto yuvā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhitāgnirdaśasuto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na samastena coditaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.430'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa eva pitṛkṛtyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukhyakartā na saṃśayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anupeto 'pyasau yadyapy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atha tatkartṛto 'khilam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.431'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kārayejjyeṣṭhamukhatas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā cetkarma tatparam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātamātre dharmapatnī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>sute gauṇasutāḥ pare</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.432'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvitīyādipurodbhūtā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaveyustatkṣaṇānnanu</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmapatnīsutotpatyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dattatatkāryato 'pi ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.433'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvitīyādisutānāṃ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadyo hainyaṃ śrutīritam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatpatnīkarmakartā ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvitīyātanayasya saḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='54'/>
	  <note type='subheading'>dattādau viśeṣaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.434'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>datto 'dhikaścedbhavati</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pituryadi punastarām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asannidhau sannidhau vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāte jīvati dattakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.435'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadbhāryākarmakartā cet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatsutāpatiriṣyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvitīyātanayaścettu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karmakṛddattakastadā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.436'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadyo hainyamavāpnoti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na jyeṣṭhātanayo yadi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tātastaddharmapatnī ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samau dattasya saṃtatam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.437'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parāṇi tatkalatrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃskāryāṇi suto na cet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sute sati sa eva syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatkarmaṇi na cetaraḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.438'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvadaivaṃ samākhyāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na tenāyaṃ hi durbalaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattena tatkalatrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prathamasya kṛtā kriyā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.439'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satyanyātanaye tāvan</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātreṇāyamathādhikaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>turyāṃśo 'pi samāṃśaḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tādṛśaṃ karma tatkṛtam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.440'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sati dattasute tasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛpatnyā vicakṣaṇaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyeṣṭhāyāstatkaniṣṭhājaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayaṃ karma samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.441'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jyeṣṭhena dattaputreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatkṣetrasya pitustu vā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛte karmaṇi tasya syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādhikyaṃ tatsutātparam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.442'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāte sati kalatrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatpuro jyāyaso 'sya cet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtaṃ karma hi dattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadyaḥ putrādhiko bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.443'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putreṣu satsu dattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pituḥ karma kṛtaṃ tu cet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tadā tasya vādhikyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāmyaṃ kimapi labhyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='55'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.444'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi tajjyeṣṭhabhāryāyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aputrāyāḥ kṛtaṃ tu tat</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karma tatpurato nūnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dattaḥ syādadhikaḥ sutāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.445'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pituḥ karma kṛtaṃ tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattena yadi tatparam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apyayaṃ mukhyakartā na</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukhyaḥ syātsuta eva vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.446'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nikhilebhyo sutebhyo 'sāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>auraso hyatiricyate</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>patnīviśeṣāḥ, tatra dharmapatnī</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>auraso dharmapatnījo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmapatnī ca kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.447'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā 'nena pūrvaṃ bālā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>durguṇā vā vivāhitā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saivāsya dharmapatnī syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmavidbhirudāhṛtā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>dvitīyapatnī</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.448'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatpaścādyā kulīnā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>surūpā vā vayo 'dhikā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na sāsya dharmapatnī syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vitīyā bhoginī smṛtā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.449'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sati cettanaye talpe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punaḥ kāmādvivāhitā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvitīyā bhoginī nārī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmapatnī na socyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>putrāṇāṃ jyaiṣṭhyakāniṣṭhyam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.450'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmapatnīsamudbhūto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jyeṣṭhaputra iti smṛtaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patnī tanayarāhitya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtavaivāhikasya sā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.451'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yeyamūḍhā dharmahetor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharmapatnyabhicoditā</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>bhoginī</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kalatre sati putre vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pautre naptari santatau</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.452'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthitāyāṃ yeyamūḍhā syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhoginī kāñcanāhvayā</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='56'/>
	    <note type='subheading'>bharmaṇāvāvātādipatnayaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bharmaṇo yāni nāmāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāni sarvāṇi kṛtstraśaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.453'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>labhate 'tastu sā proktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvitīyā kāñcanāhvayā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na dharmapatnī bhavati</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhoginyeva parā smṛtā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.454'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bharmaṇeyaṃ yataḥ sādhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vanitā tena sā smṛtā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvasvarṇapadairvācyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāvāteti ca phaṇyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.455'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parā durvarṇanāmāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāni khyātāni bhūtale</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāni sarvāṇyavāpnoti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tṛtīyeti ca tāṃ viduḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.456'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parivṛttīti tāmeke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vijñeyā vimalāmiti</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>haridrāṃ hariṇīṃ kalyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jagadurbrahmavādinaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.457'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāsāṃ tanayāḥ sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>'pyuttarottaradurbalāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmapatnīsutānnyūnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vayasāpyadhikāstarām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.458'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prathamā dharmapatnī ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>subhagā mahiṣīti ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satkarṇīti ca kalyāṇī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmajñaiḥ kathitā hi sā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.459'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmapatnīsuto bālo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mauñjīvirahito 'pi vā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiṣṭhatsu cānyāputreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karmabhiḥ satkṛteṣvapi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.460'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uttamaḥ pitṛkṛtyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmādagnipradaḥ sa tu</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena prādhānikaṃ karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yadyattattattu tanmukhāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.461'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samyakkārayituṃ nyāyyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantrān sarvānpare sutāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṭheyurvai vidhānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caiva dharmo 'khilo mahān</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='57'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.462'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vihitastu samāsena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena yāvatkṛtaṃ na tu</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvatsa tu mṛto tātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paralokaṃ na vindati</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.463'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pretatvācca na nirmuktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣuttṛṣṇāpīḍitastarām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaraṇaṃ yatra kutrāpi hy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṭan dhāvan khalan bhraman</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.464'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nityaṃ ca salilākāṅkṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pretaloke hyadhomukhaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rugṇo muṇḍaśca vikalo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jaḍo bhrāntaśca durmanāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.465'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nivasedeva satataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmādaurasa eva saḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>dharmapatnījasya sparśamātrakartṛtvam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmapatnīsamudbhūto hy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aparijñātavarṇakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.466'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pretakāryasparśamātraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>snātvā kuryādamantrakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvanmātreṇa tattātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtakṛtyaḥ sukhītarām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.467'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samyak pitṛtvamāpnoti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nityānandaḥ prajāyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tattanmātustattanayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukhyakartāra īritāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.468'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satsvauraseṣu mukhyatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ta eva kathitāḥ parāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tattatkarmasu kartāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nānyamātṛsamudbhavāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.469'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmapatnīsute bāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kevalaṃ rahitākṣare</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aspaṣṭaspaṣṭavarṇe vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyamāne mṛte tu vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.470'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kakṣyānantaraniṣṭhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yena kena sutena vā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatsamenā 'thavā bhrātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śiṣyeṇānyena bandhunā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.471'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvaṃ kārayitavyaṃ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samantreṇātra tatra cet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadyatprādhānikaṃ karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra tatrāsya vai śiśoḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='58'/>
	  <note type='subheading'>sānnidhyaṃ sparśamātrakartṛtvam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.472'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sparśamātraḥ prakartavyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatsānnidhyaṃ ca kevalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apekṣitaṃ mṛtasyātra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahātṛptyaikahetave</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.473'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatsānnidhyasparśamātrāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa mṛtaḥ sukhabhāgalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavedeva na saṃdehas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā tasmāttu taccaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.474'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛtasyaitāni proktāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tārakāṇi mahātmabhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kārakāṇi mahātṛptes</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tānīmāni smṛtāni hi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>śrāddhādāvatyantatṛptikarāṇi</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.475'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jakārapañcakaṃ tvekaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharmapatnījasannidhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatkāryakaraṇaṃ tadvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>grahaṇaśrāddhameva ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.476'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gayāśrāddhaṃ ca phalgunyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śākaśrāddhamathāpi ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathaiva varaṇaṃ gauryā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛṣotsarjanameva ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.477'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahālayaśca panasas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ta ete nikhilāḥ parāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atyantatṛptimuktyaika</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>nidānānīti tān jaguḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.478'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>janmabhūmyādikaṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tajjakārasya pañcakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛtasya tārakaṃ pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatparaṃ tvaurasasya vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.479'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sānnidhyaṃ mṛtikāle tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvitīyādisutasya vā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paralokānukūlā yā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛtasya prabhavettathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.480'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatkriyā mantrapūrvaivaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛtasya prabhavettathā</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='59'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ syādgrahaṇaśrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gayāśrāddhamathāparam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.481'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tṛptidaṃ phālgunīśrāddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṣṭottaraśatairuta</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāke śrāddhaṃ yatkriyate</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadekamatha tārakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>gaurīdānaṃ pitṛtṛptikaram</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.482'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaurīdānaṃ vṛṣotsargaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pākṣiko 'yaṃ mahālayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthāpanaṃ panasākhyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tānīmāni smṛtāni hi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.483'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitḥṇāmapi sarveṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vallabhānīti vai jaguḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jakārapañcakaṃ vatsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paralokagatasya tat</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.484'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tṛptyai sataraṇāyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>provācaivaṃ na cetarat</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>jakārapañcakam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jalārdhaṃ jāhnavītīraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>janārdanamahāsmṛtiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.485'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jvalano jananotpanna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sutasānnidhyameva ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jakārapañcakaṃ proktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathitaṃ janmamocakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>grahaṇaśrāddhalakṣaṇam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.486'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>grahasparśādatha yatan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadyaḥ patnyādibhirvṛtaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadānnenaivaṃ yacchrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karoti pitṛtṛptaye</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.487'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>snātvā tenaiva vidhinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadgrahaśrāddhamucyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadetatkila deveśo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.488'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣoḍaśaśrāddhatulitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahādānaśatādhikam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>provāca kila sarveśo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gayasya sumahātmanaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.489'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gayāphalgunikāśāka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāddhānyetatsamāni vai</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='60'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaurīdānaṃ tathaiveti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛṣotsarjanameva ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.490'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahānti niṣkriyāṇīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manuḥ kātyāyano 'ṅgirāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kutsavatsāgnibharata</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśvāmitraśukādayaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.491'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>naiteṣāṃ tulyamaparaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paitṛkaṃ karma vidyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lokatraye 'pi paramaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmādeteṣu caikakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.492'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>api kartā kṛtārthaḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukṛtī pitṛtārakaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ityevamenaṃ jahṛṣuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>panasasthāpakaṃ tu tam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.493'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vayaṃ na vidmaḥ ko vā sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūrvāsājanako 'thavā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kumbhodbhavo dadhīcirvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śibirvā nahuṣo nalaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.494'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māndhātā vā 'pyalarko vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hariścandro 'thavā mahān</seg> /</l>

	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>panasaṃ sahakāraiśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadalyādidrumaiḥ saha</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthāpayitvā vidhānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatnātsaṃvardhitaiḥ śivaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.546'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>campakaiḥ pāṭalībhiśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhūkaiḥ sumanoramaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>candanaiḥ spandanairnīpais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tacchāyābhiśca tatphalaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.547'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>patraiḥ puṣpaiśca tatkāṣṭhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānāśākaviśeṣakaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kurvan svavṛtyā prayatan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kulakoṭisahasrakaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.548'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahmalokamavāpyeha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatsāyujyamavāpnuyāt</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>panasaṃ yatra kutrāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭvā sadyo mahāmanāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.549'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatkāṣṭhapatrakusuma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śalāṭuphalamukhyakaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena kenāpi vā tṛptiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitḥṇāṃ tāṃ samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.550'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadya eva brāhmaṇebhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdhamātre ca tatphale</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭamātre 'thavā bhaktyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadyādvai pitṛtṛptaye</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.551'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śalāṭuṃ pānasaṃ patraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu yo naraḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitṛtṛptimakṛtvaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tūṣṇīṃ tiṣṭhenmahājaḍaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.552'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ tasya pitaraḥ sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śapanti kila kopataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭamātre tu tasmāttu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pānasadravyamuttamam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.553'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yena kenāpyupāyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>patreṇa ca phalena vā</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='67'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śalāṭunā chāyayā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitṛtṛptinimattakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.554'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatkiṃcidapi vā teṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pradāpayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvanmātreṇa pitaro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nityatṛptā bhavanti vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.555'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ satyatra yaḥ kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāgyavān panasī naraḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taddravyairaniśaṃ bhaktyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tṛptyakṛt pātakī bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.556'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gālavastu purā vipro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā bījāni bhaktitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krayeṇa pañcaṣān gṛhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitṛprītyai bubhukṣitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.557'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayaṃ patnyā bhakṣayitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛtṛptiṃ cakāra ha</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvanmātreṇa te cāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paraṃ tṛptāḥ śatābdakāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.558'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ānandasāgare magnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>babhūburiti naḥ śrutam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>purā kuśavane puṇye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māṇḍavyo vedavittamaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.559'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāvindhyāṭavīmārge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>panasaṃ kārtike 'vaśāt</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvārkaṃ ca natastūṣṇīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samālocya kṣaṇātparam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.560'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatpatrāṇi pavitrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>patitāni bhuvaḥ sthale</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvā samādāyaitāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nipuṇaḥ sarvakarmasu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.561'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāni svakarataḥ śīghraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtvā patrapuṭaṃ tvaran</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasmaicidvipraputrāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pātrāya jalakāṃkṣiṇe</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.562'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samudyuktāya pātuṃ taj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jalaṃ bhūmigataṃ katham</seg> /</l>

	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.563'>

	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smṛtvā dadau tadā te 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samāgatyātisatvaram</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='68'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.564'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāvanmātreṇa saṃtuṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gayāśrāddhaśatādhikāt</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atiharṣaṃ gatāḥ sadyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tamenaṃ bhūritejasam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.565'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āśīrbhiśca praśastābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyakṣeṇainamīkṣya te</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paraṃ tṛptāḥ smeti coktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvaṃ kṛtārtho mahānasi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.566'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śāstrārthadharmatattvajñas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvamasmatparitṛptikṛt</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ityuktvā<orig>''</orig>bhāṣya te tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatpadaṃ cakrapāṇinaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.567'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyatastasya purato</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jagmuḥ kila surottamaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prārthanīyaṃ viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>so 'yametādṛśo mahān</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.568'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitḥṇāṃ panasaḥ śrīmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vallabhaḥ paramo mahān</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāraśca kāravallīkaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kārukaḥ kāliko karut</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.569'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pañcaite brahmapurato</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devānāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ tadā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idamūcurvaco duḥkhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmākamapi santi hi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.570'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaṇṭakāni tato bhūyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kharāṇi sumahāntyapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvamasmākaṃ tu tatsāmyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kimarthaṃ nākarorvibho</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.571'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityevamatidainyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paunaḥpunyena kevalam</seg> /</l>

	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.572'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nākināṃ purato bhūyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prahasan vākyamabravīt</seg> /</l>

	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yanmāhātmyasumahato</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>janmasiddhātisuśriyaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.573'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭvā vibhūtiṃ paramām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asahanneva kevalam</seg> /</l>

	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatsāmyamicchurārānme</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rodanaṃ kṛtavānasi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.574'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmādetatprabhṛti te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhuvane ye daridrataḥ</seg> /</l>

	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.575'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāddheṣu keṣucitkāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśeṣeṣu kathaṃcana</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rodanācchrāddhakaraṇa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>phalaṃ te prāpnuyuḥ param</seg> //</l>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.576'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasmādatyamlavacanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>matpuraḥ proktavānasi</seg> /</l>

	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.577'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nityāmlayukto vartasva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāra re re kṛtī bhava</seg> /</l>

	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.578'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatsāmyacetaso yasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅgīkurmaśca sāṃpratam</seg> /</l>

	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.579'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatsāmyaṃ tattrayasyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>militvaiva pṛthaṅ na tu</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nityaṃ śākasahasrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bṛhatyādestu vo na tu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.580'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmākaṃ śrāddhayogyatva</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātraṃ madvacasā matam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakaṇḍakabṛhatyastā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manasā pūrvameva vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.581'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāmyaṃ kaṇṭakatastasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>panasasya tvakāmayan</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmadīyamimaṃ vṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jñātvā tūṣṇīṃ vyavasthitāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='70'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.582'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aticāturyato 'tīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nipuṇāśca vicakṣaṇāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jñātvā taddhṛdayaṃ sarvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avalepaṃ tathāvidham</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.583'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvaṃ jñātvā vidhāsyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lokeṣvadya ca śrūyatām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manvādiṣu madīyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yugādiṣu caturṣvapi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.584'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṣṭakāsu ca puṇyāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkrāntiṣu ca vṛddhike</seg> /</l>

	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.585'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra caitāsu yāḥ krūrāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pretakarmaṇi tāḥ parāḥ</seg> /</l>

	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.586'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etasminnantare tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devasṛṣṭo 'tisundaraḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patrapuṣpamahāvallī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śalāṭuphalasaṃvṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.587'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samāgatyāticapalāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kailāsāddharaṇīdharāt</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>natvā baddhāñjalipuṭaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>corvārurmama kā gatiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.588'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti covāca lokeśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhagavantaṃ pitāmaham</seg> /</l>

	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.589'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śambhunā lokanāthena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sṛṣṭaṃ śuddhaikavigraham</seg> /</l>

	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.590'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śuddhasatvaṃ dūragarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jñātvā taṃ sarvasundaram</seg> /</l>

	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.591'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvamurvāro sthāṇusṛṣṭo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavānīvacasā yataḥ</seg> /</l>

	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.592'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gurupriyo vinītaśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satataṃ guruvatsalaḥ</seg> /</l>

	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avalepaikarahitaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cādyaprabhṛti bhūtale</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.593'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daivikeṣu ca pitryeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalyāṇeṣu naveṣu ca</seg> /</l>

	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.594'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtsnakriyāviśeṣeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bālavṛddhāturādiṣu</seg> /</l>

	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.595'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daśāsveva phalānāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāśvato bhava śāśvataḥ</seg> /</l>

	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.596'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vasantamādhavasya tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grīṣmamṛtyuṃjayasya ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahāvarṣā saptatantuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaratkālyastathā punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.597'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hemantavanarājanyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiśiraḥ śītalaḥ śivaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhākaraḥ śubhakaro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nityakalyāṇakārakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.598'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prathito bhava sarveṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pānasairāmrakaiḥ śivaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rambhābhistulito bhūyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadācidadhikastathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.599'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidvatstutyo rājamānyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvajjātīyakaṣoḍaśaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃgrāhyo bhava sarvatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvanetrapriyo 'niśam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.600'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvadā sarvasaṃvṛddho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavorvāro 'tivardhitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>marutkṛtau tu tvadbīja</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vikṣepaṇamukhāditaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.601'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>phalabījasamutpatti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>paryantaṃ kila sarvadā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadiṣṭitrayataḥ śuddho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahānmantrapariṣkṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.602'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>trayastriṃśatkoṭisaṃkhya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>devānāṃ vallabho bhava</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti stutaḥ pūjitaśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāsito vihito 'naghaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='72'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.603'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atyantapitṛtṛptyaika</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kārakaḥ kila kāritaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>urvārustādṛśaḥ proktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃgrāhyaḥ śrāddhakarmasu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>urvārutyāge doṣaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.604'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tādṛśaṃ tamimaṃ yo vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mauḍhyācchrāddheṣu saṃtyajet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadya eva piturdrohī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavedeva na saṃśayaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.605'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devadrohī śrutidrohī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvadrohī sa eva hi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidhighnaḥ śrāddhahantā syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tānīmāni pravacmyataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>ṣaṇṇavatiśrāddhāni</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.606'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amāmanuyugakrānti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhṛtipātamahālayāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tisro 'ṣṭakā gajacchāyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣaṇṇavatyaḥ prakīrtitāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.607'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māsiśrāddhāni tānyevaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māsi māsi kṛtāni vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṣṭottaraśatāni syus</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tānīmāni tataḥ punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.608'>
