	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitrormṛtāhaḥ kathito</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>'laṅghanīyaḥ kathaṃcana</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raviṃ ca prathame pāde</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaviṃ caiva dvitīyake</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.609'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>trayodaśa tṛtīye syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amāvyākhyānamucyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punarnirūpyate spaṣṭam</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>amāvākyasya sāṃpratam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.610'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amāvāsyā dvādaśa syur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manavastu caturdaśa</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yugādayaśca catvāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krāntayo dvādaśa smṛtāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.611'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhṛtayaścāpi pātāśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trayodaśa trayodaśa</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahālayāḥ pañcadaśa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṣṭakā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.612'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gajacchāyā tathā caikā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṣaṇṇavatya itīritāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratimāsaṃ prakartavya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvena tāni ca sāṃpratam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='73'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.613'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kīrtitāni dvādaśa hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>militvaite 'khilānyapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṣṭottaraśatāni syuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhāni vihitāni vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.614'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prativarṣaṃ prayatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amāvāsyāstatra kḷptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māsāntā nityameva vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.615'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atraiva pitṛyajñaśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kartavyatvena coditaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrutyukto 'yaṃ pitḥṇāṃ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atitṛptyaikakārakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.616'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāddhānāṃ prakṛtitvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>coditaḥ smṛtikartṛbhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naitasmāttu paraṃ śrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyate yatra kutracit</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.617'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutyuktametadeva syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etanmātre kṛte tu cet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvāṇyapi kṛtāni syur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>athavaitaddine tu yaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.618'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāddhaṃ vai kriyate tadvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṛtiśceti vai jaguḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>itaraiḥ sarvapitryāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrutito brahmavādinaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.619'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadanuṣṭhānataḥ sarvā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>-nuṣṭhānaṃ jāyatetarām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadeva prakṛtiḥ proktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hi kaiścidbrahmavādibhiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>darśaśrāddham</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.620'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>darśānuṣṭhānataḥ sarva</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāddhāni syuḥ kṛtāni vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti sarve trayo lokās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tūṣṇīṃ tiṣṭhanti kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.621'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na kenāpi ca tasmāttu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>darśaḥ saṃtyajyate paraḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>darśamātre 'nuṣṭhite 'smin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena kena prakārataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.622'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvāṇyanuṣṭhitāni syur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti vai lokasaṃsthitiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tatra sākṣācchrāddhaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriyate yena kena vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='74'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.623'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kriyate kṛtinā tattu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhūtale yena kenacit</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenāpyudakamātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhenāpi kṛtena vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.624'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvāṇyapi kṛtānyevety</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>evaṃ sarvaikaniścayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa darśastādṛśasyānu</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>-ṣṭhātā yo brāhmaṇottamaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.625'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>agnihotrī sa eva syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>darśayājyakṣayānyapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>somayājī sarvayājī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tattyāgī brahmaghātakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.626'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa eva karmacaṇḍālas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tamenaṃ brahmaghātakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvā samāgataṃ pāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāṅmātreṇāpi nārcayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.627'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prakṛtiśrāddhamātraśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>darśa eva na cāparaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitṛyajñamukhādeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakṛtitvaṃ tadīritam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.628'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tattaiva vihito 'yaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛyajñaḥ śrutīritaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>darśābdikau tulyau</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>darśo mṛtāhaśca samau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kadācittu śakyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.629'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yena kenāpi vā tyaktuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tattyāgī cetpatatyadhaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitrormṛtāhastvannena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāryaḥ syāttu na cānyataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.630'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na hemnānnena homena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>piṇḍadānena mantrataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akṣeṇa śaṣpairmantrairvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na duḥkhena tadācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.631'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tvagnaukaraṇādbrahma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhojanātpiṇḍadānataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtaṃ bhavati tatkarma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na ceccaṇḍālatāṃ vrajet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>darśābdikau na tyājyau</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.632'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛtāho 'laṅghanīyaḥ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>darśaścāpi tathāvidhaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='75'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena kena prakāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śakyate kila durbalaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.633'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akiṃcanairdurbalairvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyādhitairvā viśeṣataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bādhitairdhāvamānairvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>'jñātavāsibhireva vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.634'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>naṣṭakriyairnaṣṭadhanair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛtaprāyairathāpi vā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyuktuṃ na śakyate śrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛtāhākhyaṃ kathaṃcana</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.635'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛtāhastādṛśaḥ kḷptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prativarṣaṃ ca cāndrataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mānenaiva bhavennūnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>akḷpto 'nyena cedbhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.636'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atyantāvaśyako na syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akḷptaścettu yo bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kḷptasyāvṛttirityeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maryādā śāstrasaṃmatā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.637'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tithyagnī na tithistithyāśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛṣṇebho 'nalo grahāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tithyarkau na śivo 'śvo 'mā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>tithī manvādayaḥ smṛtāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.638'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāttu kḷptā ityuktās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataśca krāntayaḥ smṛtāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sūryarāśikramaṇataś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cā 'kḷptā ityudīritāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>saṃkrāntisvarūpam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.639'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayane dve ca viṣuvau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catasraḥ ṣaḍaśītayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catasro viṣṇupadyaśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkramā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.640'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthirabheṣvarkasaṃkrāntir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jñeyā viṣṇupadāhvayā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṣaḍaśītimukhaṃ jñeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvisvabhāveṣu rāśiṣu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.641'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saumyayāmyāyane nūnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavato mṛgakarkaṭau</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tulāmeṣobhayaṃ jñeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣuvaṃ sūryasaṃkrame</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>saṃkrāntipuṇyakālaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.642'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaḥsaṃkramaṇe puṇyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaḥ kṛtsnaṃ prakīrtitam</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='76'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rātrau saṃkramaṇe bhānor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyavasthā sarvakarmasu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.643'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saumyayāmyāyanadvandve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśeṣa iti vai jaguḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atītyāprāpya tatkālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puṇyakāla udāhṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.644'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃkrāntiṣvakhilāsvevaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatkālaḥ puṇyadaḥ smṛtaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yā yāḥ sannihitāḥ nāḍyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāstāḥ puṇyatamāḥ smṛtāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.645'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayane dve ca viṣuve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catasraḥ ṣaḍaśītayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catasro viṣṇupadyaśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkramā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.646'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>triṃśatkarkaṭake nāḍyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>makare viṃśatiḥ smṛtāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vartamāne tulāmeṣe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāḍyastūbhayato daśa</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.647'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣaḍaśītyāṃ vyatītāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṣaṣṭiruktāḥ praṇāḍikāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puṇyāyāṃ viṣṇupadyāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāk paścādapi ṣoḍaśa</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.648'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ardharātrāttadūrdhvaṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkrāntau dakṣiṇāyane</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrvameva dine kuryād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uttarāyaṇa eva vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>annaśrāddhe kutapaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.649'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadyattu paitṛkaṃ karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāddhamannena cetpunaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kutape taddhi kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadbhinnasya tu cedayam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.650'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidhiḥ khyāto na sandeho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharmavidbhiḥ sanātanaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>odanaśrāddhamātrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkrāntīnāṃ ca kṛtsnaśaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.651'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvādaśānāṃ tathānyeṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kutapo mukhya ucyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadbhinnasnānadānādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>tarpaṇādiṣu te smṛtāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.652'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadā tadā tu vihitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ete kālaviśeṣakāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='77'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāddhakartustu sarvatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtinaḥ kāla ekakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.653'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kutapo vedavacasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukhyaḥ prokto na cetaraḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'pi yasmin dine samyag</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dakṣiṇāyanakālakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.654'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tamuttarāyaṇe kuryād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uttarāyaṇameva hi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kutapasya tu yatra syāl</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lobhapūrvaṃ tathācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>darśasaṃkrāntyādiśrāddhāni</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.655'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatkrāntiyugmaśrāddhādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtyaṃ sarvaṃ yathā labhet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>auttare hyayane samyak</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kutape 'smin tathā<orig>''</orig>caret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.656'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃkrattimātrāḥ kathitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akḷptā iti sūribhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ dhṛtiśca pātaśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣaḍviṃśatikasaṃkhyayā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.657'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathitāḥ kila sarvāṇyapy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akḷptānyeva kevalam</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>mahālayaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahālayā bahuvidhāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvaṃ pañcadaśeti vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.658'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣoḍaśaiveti kecittu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daśeti ca tathāpare</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pañcaiveti trayaṃ ceti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ekameveti kecana</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.659'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣoḍhā tāḥ kathitāḥ sadbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṣṭakā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadenduḥ pitṛdaivatye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>haṃsaścaiva kare sthitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.660'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāmyā tithirbhavetsā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gajacchāyā prakīrtitā</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>śrāddhadevatāḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karmāṇi kāni khyātāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tridaivatyāni kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.661'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣaḍdaivatyāni kāni syur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>navadaivatyakāni ca</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='78'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatrādau tu tridaivatyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛtāhastveka ucyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.662'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣaḍdaivatyastu darśaḥ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṣṭakā navadevatāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṣṭakāsu ca vṛddhau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gayāyāṃ ca mṛte 'hani</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.663'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātuḥ śrāddhaṃ pṛthak kuryād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyatra patinā saha</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patinā saha kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛthaktvena kṛte yadi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.664'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatpaitṛkamahāsaṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>saukhyavighnakaraṃ bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitṛvargastu pūrvaṃ syān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātṛvargastataḥ param</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.665'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato mātāmahānāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vargo 'yaṃ tatkalatrataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>pitrye 'pradakṣiṇam, śūnyalalāṭatā ca</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitṛvargo yatra pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra syādapradakṣiṇam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.666'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apasavyaṃ tathā śūnya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>lalāṭaṃ prabhavedapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatra yatrā 'pasavyaṃ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra tatrā 'pradakṣiṇam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.667'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā śūnyalalāṭaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pradhānāṅge ca tatsmṛtam</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>tatra gṛhālaṃkāro na kartavyaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatraitattritayaṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhālaṃkaraṇa na tu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>mātṛvarge pradakṣiṇādi</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.668'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātṛvargo yatra pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra syāttu pradakṣiṇam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>savyaṃ puṇḍralalāṭaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maṅgalasnānameva ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.669'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhālaṃkaraṇaṃ cāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maṅgalāni tathā punaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitḥṇāṃ ca kramo mukhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatyapi ca santatam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.670'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prapitāmahapūrvaṃ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatpitāmahamadhyakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitranta eva kathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taduccāraṇalakṣaṇam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='79'/>
	  <note type='subheading'>śrāddhabhedena viśvedevāḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.671'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣāṃ ca viśvedevāste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyasaṃjñikanāmakāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvatra vṛddhaśabdaśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayoktavyaścaturṣvapi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.672'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathaiva mātṛvarge 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tārtīyīke ca vargake</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jananakramataścedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣāmuccāraṇaṃ bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.673'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etadviruddhaṃ tatsarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadviruddhamidaṃ param</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niḥśeṣamiti boddhavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>te sarve devatāḥ kila</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.674'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vasavaḥ pitaro 'tra syū</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rudrāścāpi pitāmahāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prapitāmahāśca kathitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādityā iti tadgaṇāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>sāpiṇḍyanirūpaṇam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.675'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etattrayātpūrvakasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caturthasya sakṛtkila</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāddhasya karaṇaṃ proktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pātheyākhyasya sūribhiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.676'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadevaṃ saptapūrṣākhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāpiṇḍyasya nirūpaṇam</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>āśaucaṃ ca daśatridinamekadinam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvattu sūtakaṃ sarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tajjānāṃ saṃprakīrtitam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.677'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samānodakasaṃjñāśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato bhūyaḥ sagotriṇaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadūrdhvamiti vijñeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣāṃ tatsūtakaṃ tataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.678'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tridinaṃ caikadivasaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paścātsnānaṃ ca bodhitam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krameṇaiva paraṃ yāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvatparyantameva vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.679'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>snānamātraṃ ca kathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasaṃgādidamīritam</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='80'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jīvacchrāddhaṃ tu tatproktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvaśrāddhavilakṣaṇam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.680'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>catvāriṃśaddevatākam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>athavā pañcasaṃkhyayā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punaḥ sametaṃ tatprocur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atastaddvividhaṃ smṛtam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.681'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāddhāni kānicidbhūyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devatāsahitānyapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adaivikāni ca punas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tānīmāni ca bhaṇyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.682'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vṛddhiśrāddhaṃ gayāśrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hataśrāddhaṃ tathaiva ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dadhiśrāddhaṃ tṛṇaśrāddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>amādīnyakhilānyapi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.683'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadaivikāni khyātāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pretaśrāddhāni kṛtsnaśaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adaivikāni proktāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sodakumbhāni kṛtsnaśaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>amādiśrāddhe kartavyāni</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.684'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pretaśrāddheṣu sarvatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkalpo mukhyataḥ smṛtaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhyanujñāpi paramā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā cātrā<orig>''</orig>vāhanaṃ matam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.685'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sapādyārghyagandhadhūpa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīpapuṣpāṇi kevalāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tilāḥ sarvatra tūṣṇīkā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtsnaṃ vedamanu vinā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.686'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra pūjā prakartavyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>piṇḍadānaṃ ca dakṣiṇā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvaśyakyatra paramā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadhyājye vastrameva ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.687'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pūrvāhṇa eva kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kutapaṃ nāvalokayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>piṇḍāni vāyasebhyo vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛdhrebhyo vā nivedayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='81'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.688'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cejjalacarebhyo vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānyatra tu vinikṣipet</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>ekoddiṣṭādhikāriṇaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrātre bhaginyai putrāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāmine mātulāya ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.689'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mitrāya gurave śrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>piturmātuḥ svasustathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śvaśurāya śyālakāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caikoddiṣṭaṃ na pārvaṇam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>apiṇḍakāni sapiṇḍakāni ca śrāddhāni</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.690'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yugakrāntimanuśrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pretaśrāddhādikaṃ tathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apiṇḍakāni khyātāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapiṇḍānītarāṇi ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.691'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahālayaṣoḍaśatve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gajacchāyā 'tra no bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṣaṇṇavatyatvasaṃkhyāyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā hi pañcadaśatvataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.692'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yayā kayā saṃkhyayā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayā ṣaḍvidhayā bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahālayatvasya siddhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśeṣe tu phalaṃ tathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.693'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvatraivaṃ samākhyātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayāsādhikyataḥ phalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhavatyeva sumahan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nātra kāryā vicāraṇā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>mahālayaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.694'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahālayaḥ pākṣiko 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvividhaḥ parikīrtitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekaviprānekavipra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhedena kila tatra vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.695'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekaviprākhyapakṣasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svarūpaṃ vacmi pūrvataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahālayānāṃ sarveṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āpakṣāntasya kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.696'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye vṛtāḥ prathamadivase</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vānyeṣāṃ ca kevalam</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='82'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ta eva nānye kartavyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pakṣānte śrāddhadakṣiṇā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.697'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadaiva hi deyā syān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na deyā syāttadā tadā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anekaviprapakṣe tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratinityaṃ ca bāḍavāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.698'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhinnabhinnāḥ prakartavyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratinityaṃ pṛthak pṛthak</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dakṣiṇā ca pradātavyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratipūrṣaṃ pṛthak pṛthak</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.699'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prativargaṃ na cedviprā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varaṇīyā vidhānataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṣaḍdaivatyaṃ tu sarvatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>navadaivatyameva vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.700'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khyāto mahālayaḥ sadbhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṣaḍvidho 'pi mahālayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evameva prakartavyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nānyathā taṃ samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>sakṛnmahālayaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.701'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caredyadi viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānādaivatakena vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakṛnmahālayaḥ so 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa bhavetkiṃ tu sa smṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.702'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gayāśrāddhasamaḥ ko 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathitaḥ paramo mahān</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anirvācyo 'khilaiḥ śāstrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāśrāddhaviśeṣakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.703'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tādṛśaśrāddhakartā 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṣaḍdaivatyena saṃyutam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>navadaivatakenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣṇunā vā samanvitam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.704'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhurilocanasaṃyuktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuryācchrāddhaṃ mahālayam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakṛtpakṣeṇa vā pūrva</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>proktapakṣeṣu yena vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.705'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pakṣeṇa kenacitkuryāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa mahālayakṛdbhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na cedayaṃ gayāśrāddha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>tulitaṃ yaṃ ca kaṃcana</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.706'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puṇyaṃ śrāddhaviśeṣaṃ vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuryādeveti sā śrutiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='83'/>
	    <note type='subheading'>mahālayasya bharaṇyādīnāṃ ślāghyatvam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dine dine gayātulya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bharaṇyāṃ gayapañcakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.707'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daśatulyaṃ vyatīpāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pakṣamadhye tu viṃśatiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvādaśyāṃ śatamityāhur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>amāyāṃ tu sahasrakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>mahālayakālaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.708'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āṣāḍhīmavadhiṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yasyāḥ pakṣastu pañcamaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahālaya iti proktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitḥṇāṃ śrāddhasaṃpade</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.709'>
	    <note type='subheading'>yatināṃ mahālayaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra pakṣe yatīnāṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvādaśyāṃ śrāddhamācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>durmṛtānām</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caturdaśyāṃ viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>durmṛtānāṃ caretkriyām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>sumaṅgalyāḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.710'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sumaṅgalīnāṃ kathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>navamyāṃ śrāddhamekakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśrotriyakalatrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāvattadbhartṛvartanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.711'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāṇiloke tatastattu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuryādvā na tu vā dvayam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etadasti hyanuṣṭhānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakṛnmahālaye tu cet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.712'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvatpaitṛkadharmāḥ syus</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tulitastena sa smṛtaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atīto yadi pakṣaḥ sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadbhinne 'parapakṣake</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.713'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadanyasmin tādṛśe vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadanyasmin tathāvidhe</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvattu vṛścikastiṣṭhet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvattattu samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='84'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.714'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adarśane vṛścikasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāte tatpitaraḥ param</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanurmāse tu saṃprāpte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhākaraṇamīkṣya vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.715'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadyaḥ śāpapradānāyod</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuktā eva bhavanti vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvadeva tato bhaktyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhaṃ mahālayākhyakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.716'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidhinaiva prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ceddoṣo mahān bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena kena prakāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataśca śrāddhamekakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.717'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kuryādeva pituḥ śrāddha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tulyaṃ pratyabdameva vai</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>mahālaye pare 'hani tarpaṇam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratyabdadharmā nikhilāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakṛnmahālayasya te</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.718'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhaveyureva tasmāttu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pare 'hanyeva tarpaṇam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāddhe yāvanta uddiṣṭās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatpare 'hani tān yajet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>ravyudayātpūrvaṃ tarpaṇam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.719'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taccheṣatiladarbhaistu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvaṃ sūryodayasya vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pranaṣṭapitṛkaścettu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tarpaṇasyādhikāryayam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.720'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa pranaṣṭaprasūrnityaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tarpaṇe 'dhikṛto bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>jīvatpitṛkaśrāddham</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māsiśrāddhe pitṛyajñe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāndīśrāddhe ca santatam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.721'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jīvattāto 'pi kartā syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ā homātkaraṇaṃ smṛtam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrvadvaye tu satataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāndīśrāddhaṃ tu sarvadā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.722'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yeṣāmeva pitā dadyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tebhyo dadyāttu tatsutaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='85'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāte bhraṣṭe ca saṃnyaste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rugṇe rogaikapīḍite</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.723'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatkartavyaṃ tena karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paitṛkaṃ tatsutaścaret</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>śrāddhe vaidikāgnyadhikāriṇaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitroḥ śrāddhaṃ svapatnyāśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapatnīmātureva ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.724'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātāmahasya tatpatnyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāddhamaupāsane bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadbhinnānāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhaṃ syāllaukikānale</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.725'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aputrāṇāṃ pitṛvyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrātḥṇāmagrajanmanām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatpatnīnāṃ ca sarvāsāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>laukikāgnau yathāvidhi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.726'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avaśyatvena kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na tyājyaṃ dharmato 'khilaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratyabdaṃ śrāddhamātraṃ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitṛśrāddhasamānataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>aṣṭakāmāsiśrāddham</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.727'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māghakṛṣṇāṣṭamī yasyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rātrau kuryātsamantrakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>homaṃ dadhyañjalistasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūpasya sthānake tataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.728'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>navamyāṃ tu tato bhaktyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāddhaṃ kuryādvidhānataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māsiśrāddhavidhānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvanmātreṇa kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.729'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāni śiṣṭāni sarvāṇi hy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekādaśa kilā 'ṣṭakāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtā eva bhavennūnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>laghūpāyo 'yamucyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.730'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṣṭakāsu yathā darśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāddhato 'khilapaitṛkāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtaprāyā iti tathā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>laghūpāyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.731'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvāṇi pṛthageva syuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryāṇi niyamena vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṣṭottarāṇi khyātāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadācittu viśeṣataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.732'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asamarthasya tu prokto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>laghūpāyastu kaścana</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='86'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samarthastu yathākalpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratisaṃvatsaraṃ dvijaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.733'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvāṇi kuryācchrāddhāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ceddoṣaśca kīrtitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>śrāddhaprayogaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāddhaprayogaśca mayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtsna evocyate 'dhunā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.734'>
	    <note type='subheading'>nimantraṇam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nimantraṇaṃ ca pūrvedyuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakartavyaṃ vidhānataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>nimantraṇārhāḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viprāṇāṃ vedināṃ nityaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāryaṃ nā 'vedināṃ tarām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.735'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kukṣau tiṣṭhati yasyānnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vedābhyāsena jīryate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kulaṃ tārayate teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daśa pūrvān daśā 'parān</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.736'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vedādhyāyī tu yo vipraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satataṃ brahmaṇi sthitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sācāraḥ sāgnihotrī ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>so 'gnirvai kavyavāhanaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>vedahīnanimantraṇe</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.737'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mantrapūtaṃ tu yacchrāddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amantrāya prayacchati</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadannaṃ tasya kukṣisthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rudatyeva na saṃśayaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.738'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śapatyenaṃ pradātāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svasya taṃ tādṛśaṃ kila</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajanaṃ ca pradātāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadannaṃ taddhṛdi sthitam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.739'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvataḥ piṇḍān khalu sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāśnāti haviṣo 'lpakaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvataḥ śūlān grasati</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpya vaivasvataṃ yamam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.740'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dātṛhastaṃ ca chindanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jihvāyamitarasya ca</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='87'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśyataścakṣuṣī caiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śṛṇvataḥ śrotrayugmakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.741'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>durlabhāyāṃ svaśākhāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhoktḥnanyānnivedayet</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>svaśāravīyaḥ ślāghyaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitroḥ śrāddhe viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svaśākhīyānnivedayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.742'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kanyādānaṃ pitṛśrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śuddhakacchebhya eva ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradeyaṃ syātprayatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsatkacchebhya eva vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>abhojyāḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.743'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rogayuktaṃ duṣṭabuddhiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duṣṭacāritratatparam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadoṣakaṃ ca sadveṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kunakhaṃ śyāvadantakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.744'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nityā 'prayatavarṣmāṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>durvarṇaṃ ca kurūpiṇam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nakṣatrajīvanaṃ dāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtyaṃ śūdraikajīvinam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.745'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śūdraikayājakaṃ śūdra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>puṣṭaṃ śūdraniketanam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūdrapratigrahaparaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nityayācakameva ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.746'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā pallavikaṃ krūram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ātmasaṃbhāvinaṃ śapam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atimāninamagrāhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niṣkriyaṃ vedanindakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.747'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vedavikrayiṇaṃ nityaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grāmayājakameva ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brahmavidveṣiṇaṃ caiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brahmasvaharaṇonmukham</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.748'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paradāraparaṃ duṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paradāraikacintakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyaktabhāryaṃ dattaputraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putravikrayiṇaṃ tathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.749'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātāpitrorupoṣṭāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gurudrohiṇameva ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanasaṃgrahaṇodyukta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mānasaṃ dhaninaṃ kaṭum</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='88'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.750'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirdayaṃ dānavimukhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāstikaṃ paradūṣakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maṇikārasvarṇakāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>rajakādipurohitam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.751'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhikāśamatṛptaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>durvādaṃ dāmbhikaṃ jaḍam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vedakarmatyāgapūrva</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāstramātrakṛtaśramam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.752'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāstikaṃ kiṃbhaviṣyanta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛṇinaṃ tyaktavedakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyaktasnānaṃ tyaktasaṃdhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivṛttakṣurakarmakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.753'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtārdhakṣurakarmāṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tucchaṃ vikasitamehanam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phalguṃ kubjaṃ tathā cāndhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>badhiraṃ bhrāntamulbaṇam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.754'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>unmattaṃ durbalaṃ sannaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kopinaṃ kunakhaṃ ratam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṇḍakaṃ golakaṃ vrātyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aśuciṃ parasūtakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.755'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parānninaṃ parādhīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karṣakaṃ vārdhuṣiṃ vṛṣam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nṛpavṛttiṃ vaiśyavṛttiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūdravṛttiṃ durāśayam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.756'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atyantacapalaṃ śrāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avīrāpatimeva ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathaiva garbhiṇīnātham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhojyānnaṃ durāgasam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.757'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aśrotriyasutaṃ kāru</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhṛtavastraṃ ca duḥśaṭham</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāyakaṃ vraṇinaṃ kṣudra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāṣiṇaṃ tucchabhāṣakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.758'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hāsyakāraṃ naṭaṃ nāṭya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyaṃ buruḍakṛtyakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣudrajīvaṃ kāryajīvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nityavetanajīvinam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.759'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na bhojayetprayatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nimantraṇadinātparam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dinatrayaṃ varjayityā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛṇuyādaticaryayā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='89'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.760'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anumāsikabhoktāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pakṣamātraṃ parityajet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ūnamāsikabhoktāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māsamātraṃ parityajet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.761'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nagnaśrāddhe varṣamātraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>navaśrāddhe tadardhakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṣoḍaśe sārdhavarṣaṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapiṇḍe ca dvivatsaram</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.762'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varjayitvā dvijaṃ paścād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grāhayecchrāddhakarmaṇi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūdrāmaśrāddhagaṃ samyak</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyajedvarṣatrayaṃ tathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.763'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nṛpavaiśyaśrāddhabhissā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhakṣakaṃ santataṃ tarām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varjayedabdamātraṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>grāmacaṇḍālakarmasu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.764'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āmaśrāddhagṛhītāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taddine nāvalokayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divārātramasaṃbhāṣyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divākīrtyapurohitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.765'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puṇyakāle tvasaṃbhāṣyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kulālānāṃ purohitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhānuvāre bhaumavāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śukravāre ca santatam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.766'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asaṃbhāṣyaḥ prayatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parasaunapurohitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parvaṇoryogakāleṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvijaveśyāpurohitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.767'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāvekṣyā eva caite vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi dṛṣṭāstadā tadā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agnermanve 'nuvākasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṭhanātkṛtakṛtyatā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.768'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tīrthapratigrahī dṛṣṭo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi śrāddhadine tarām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tīrthajīvī tadāvāsī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatpurohita eva ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.769'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā dṛṣṭastadā sūryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyemeti vilokayet</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='90'/>
	    <note type='subheading'>varaṇam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tripūrṣacaryāvṛttāntaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>spaṣṭo yasya bhavettarām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.770'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tādṛśaṃ prayataṃ dvāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alolupamadāmbhikam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadṛcchālābhasantuṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrotriyaṃ vedinaṃ śucim</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.771'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nityāgniṃ pūrvavayasaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sudhiyaṃ satkulodbhavam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmātpratyupakāraika</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>rahitaṃ sumukhaṃ dvijam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.772'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samīkṣya varayetsamyag</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇaṃ śrāddhakarmaṇi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādau saṃkalpya prayataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapavitrakarastathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.773'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>darbhapāṇiḥ kṛtaprāṇāy</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>āmo 'tvaratarastarām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akrodhanaśca sumukho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vācā saṃkalpamācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.774'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deśaṃ kālaṃ ca saṃkīrtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā ca prakṛte tataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitḥn devān prākṛtānvai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samuddiśya ca prākṛtam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.775'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kariṣye karma caiveti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkalpaṃ prathamaṃ caret</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>prasādāya darbhadānam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśveṣāmatra devānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthānamāhavanīyake</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.776'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā prasādo 'dya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karaṇīya udīryate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ityevaṃ dakṣiṇe haste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadyāddarbhān dvijasya vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.777'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etaddhai varaṇaṃ proktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitḥṇāmevameva vai</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>maṇḍalapūjā</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtvā tu varaṇaṃ paścād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>oṃ tatheti ca codite</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='91'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.778'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtvā tu maṇḍalaṃ śuddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomayena vidhānataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maṇḍalaṃ pūjayitvādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daivaṃ paitṛkameva ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.779'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maṇḍalātpaścime bhāge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇe svāgatīkṛte</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatraiva visṛjetpādyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣālayenmaṇḍalopari</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>gulphayoradhaḥ kṣālanam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.780'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pādaprakṣālanaṃ śrāddhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varaṃ syādgulphayoradhaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitḥṇāṃ narakaṃ ghoraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>romasaṃsaktavāriṇā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.781'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi syādromasaṃsaktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pādaprakṣālane bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taddoṣaparihārāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ājānu kṣālayetparam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>ācamanaprakaraṇam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.782'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādāvantye ca pādye ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṣṭare vikire tathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ucchiṣṭapiṇḍadāne ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣaṭsu cācamanaṃ smṛtam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>kartuḥ pūrvaṃ bhokturācamane</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.783'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kartā 'nācamya yadbhoktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuryādācamanakriyām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śuno mūtrasamaṃ toyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmāttatparivarjayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>devādibhojanadik</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.784'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>udaṅmukhastu devānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitḥṇāṃ dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradadyātpārvaṇe sarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devapūjāvidhānataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>varaṇatrayakālaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.785'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kecidrātrau tu pūrvedyus</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taddine prātareva ca</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='92'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kutape taddine bhūyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trivāraṃ śrāddhamūcire</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.786'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sakṛdeveti tajjāmi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayā śrāddhaṃ prakurvate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatsthāne varaṇaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhaṃ sarvaṃ prakurvate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.787'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ suvariti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāhāntamantro vai tataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>viṣṭaraḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ vo viṣṭaraśceti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradadyādviṣṭaraṃ tathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.788'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svadhāśabdaṃ pitṛsthāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvatraivaṃ vidhīyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anenaiva tu mantreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatpūjā vihitā parā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.789'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ hi paramo mantraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitḥṇāmarcane mahān</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prayoktavyaḥ śrāddhadine</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantrāḥ prākṛtamātṛkāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.790'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśvān devān pitḥnvāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbudhyoccārya tatparam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrvoktenaiva mantreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣṭaraṃ pratipādayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.791'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣaṣṭhyantenāsanaṃ dadyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇaśca kriyatāmiti</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣaṇaṃ dadyāttu darbheṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hastasaṃsparśanena vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.792'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāpnuvantu bhavantaśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tārapūrveṇa vai vadet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arghyaṃ kṛtvā kṛtaḥ proktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kartavya iti cettataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.793'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>darbhānāstīrya bhūpṛṣṭhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra pātramadhobilam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nikṣipya taduparyevaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>darbhairācchidya vai tataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.794'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uddhṛtya prokṣya tatpātre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yavānnikṣipya śambaram</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhūrbhuvaḥsuvarāpūrva</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gandhākṣatasumādikam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='93'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.795'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra nikṣipya taccāmbhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taddhaste 'rghyaṃ pradāpayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvāhanaṃ ca tatpūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paraṃ vā tatkṛtākṛtam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.796'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi kartavyadhīḥ syāccet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadā vyāhṛtibhiścaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yā divyā iti vā no ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devā vo 'rdhyamiti bruvan</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.797'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dadyāttamarghyaṃ devebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛbhyaśca krameṇa vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvāhane viśvedevā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uśantastviti yugmakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.798'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ubhayatra prakathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kecanātrāparāmṛcam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśvedevāsa ityekāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśvedeveti vai parām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.799'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgacchantviti tāṃ cāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devārthe prajapanti vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitṛsthāna uśantastvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āyantu na itīva vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.800'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prajapeyuḥ kecanātra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadetat kathitaṃ param</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtākṛtaṃ prakathitam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anuktābādhakaṃ na tu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.801'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vedamātrānuktitastu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandhākṣatayavādikam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūpadīpadukūlādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtsnaṃ yajñopavītakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.802'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvaṃ vyāhātebhirdadyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tūṣṇīṃ vā tadyathāruci</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>agnaukaṇāma</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato 'gnau karaṇaṃ kuryād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yadi pūrvaṃ svasūtrataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.803'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anuktamantraiḥ kāścittu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtāḥ syustāḥ kriyāstataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatpūrvakṛtasaṃkalpa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>karmamadhyādhikatvataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='94'/>
	  <note type='subheading'>punaḥsaṃkalpaprakaraṇam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.804'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatkiṃcidviguṇībhūyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadvaiguṇyata eva vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punaḥ saṃkalpayitvaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatpūrvakakriyāṃ caret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.805'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvatraivaṃ vijānīyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tattatsaṃkalpakarmasu</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na cedekasya saṃkalpa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ekadhaiva bhaveddhi vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.806'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsamāptervidhānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṛte paitṛke kila</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anuktamantrapaṭhanāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punaḥ saṃkalpamācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.807'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadyuktamantramātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatkarma calati sthale</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatkarmamadhye na punaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkalpaḥ prabhaveddhi vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.808'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmātsaṃkalpayitvā 'tha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cāśaikaraṇamārabhet</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>pariveṣaṇaprakārapaurvāparyam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃparistīrya vidhinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>darbhaistairdakṣiṇāgrakaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.809'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>annamādāya pakvāttu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>copastīrya tataḥ punaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mekṣaṇenānnamādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantrametaṃ śrutīritam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.810'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratikalpaikapaṭhitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>somāyeti huneddhaviḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taccheṣeṇa yamāyeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agnayeti ca tatparam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.811'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uddeśatyāgamātraṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prācīnāvītinaiva vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samuccārya punaścaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pariṣicyāpradakṣiṇam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.812'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amantrakaṃ vidhānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadannaṃ śiṣṭamuddhṛtam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ardhaṃ kṣipedviprapātre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>datvā hastodakaṃ tataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.813'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daivapātre 'bhighāryātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvavacca vidhānataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='95'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>annaṃ ca pāyasaṃ bhakṣyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyañjanāni phalāni ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.814'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>payo madhu ghṛtaṃ cānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūpaṃ tu pariveṣayet</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>agre sūpadāne</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi sūpādatha punar</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vastu syātpariveṣitam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.815'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadrākṣasaṃ bhavecchrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā tasmānna cācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>rakṣoghnamantram</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>annamājyenābhighārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāyatryā prokṣya tatparam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.816'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dadhinānnaṃ ca pracchādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cāhamasmīti sūktakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prapaṭhedatra vidhinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rākṣoghnaśrutimadhyagam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>yena kenāpyuccāraṇamasamarthasya</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.817'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayaṃ yadyasamarthaścen</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantroccāraṇakarmaṇi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena kena ca vipreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vācanīyaṃ prayatnataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.818'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>naite mantrā yājamānā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atroktāḥ kila karmaṇi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rākṣasānāṃ vināśāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vedaghoṣaḥ praśasyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.819'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ghoṣo brāhmaṇaiḥ kartuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śakyate prakṛte kila</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>uṣṇaṃ dātavyam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>annaṃ vastūni yānīha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pātreṇa saha kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.820'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cullisthāni bhaveyurhi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tebhyaḥ pātrebhya eva vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>darvimyaśca samuddhṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svalpaṃ svalpaṃ yathoṣmakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.821'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā bhavettadā tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viprebhyaḥ pariveṣayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ūṣmabhāgā hi pitaraś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>coṣmaśūnyaṃ na paitṛkam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='96'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.822'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavedeva na sandehaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paścādannaṃ yathā purā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viprahaste jalaṃ datvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāyatryā prokṣya vai tataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.823'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadaivāhavanīyaṃ vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dakṣiṇāgniṃ vidhānataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nityaṃ vai gārhapatyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pariṣiñcati mantrataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.824'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satyaṃ tvartena vidhinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇaṃ pariṣicya vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛthivī teti tatsarvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhimṛśya tataḥ punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.825'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samupasparśayitvātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitrādibhyo nivedayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradhānametaddhomaśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samupasparśanaṃ punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>mantrāḥ vācyāḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.826'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etanmantratrayaṃ vācā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yajamānaḥ samuccaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etanmantratrayaṃ śrāddhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradhānakamihocyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.827'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā piṇḍapradānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantrāḥ kecana coditāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etaduccāraṇāśaktau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyarthaṃ śrāddhaṃ bhavetkila</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.828'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmādyatnena mahatā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>homāgneya iti trayam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvayaṃ vātha punaścaikaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛthivī teti kiṃcana</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.829'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>annābhimarśane proktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amṛtopastarāṇakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pañca prāṇāhutau mantrāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāṇāyetyādikā parāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.830'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathāvadeva vācā te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravācyā śrāddhakarmaṇi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na cecchrāddhaṃ bhavennaitad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etairmantrairbhaveddhi tat</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.831'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paścātpiṇḍapradāne 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantrā vācyāśca bhaktitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='97'/>
	    <note type='subheading'>mantravaikalpanāśāya vedaghoṣaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhojane samupakrānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vedaghoṣaṃ prayatnataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.832'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kārayedvipramukhataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛgyajuḥsāmabhistarām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena vaikalyadoṣā ye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rakṣobhiḥ parikalpitāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.833'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadyo naṣṭā bhaveyurhi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmādeva tathācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathānyaghoṣo viprāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śṛṇuyānnātra kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.834'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā ghoṣaḥ prakartavyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svayaṃ paramukhāttathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatnātkārayitavyaśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na ceddoṣo mahān bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.835'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vedoccāraṇasāmarthya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikalo yadi tatkaraḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>namo vaḥ pitaro mantra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātraṃ bhaktyā japettu vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.836'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ viṣṇurvyāhṛtīrvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gāyatrīṃ vā vidhānataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣṇorarāṭamantre vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāyatrīṃ vaiṣṇavīmapi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.837'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cettu pauruṣaṃ sūktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>athavā taṃ triyambakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ā vo rājānamantraṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madhutrayamathāpi vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.838'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>namo brahmaṇyamantraṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daśa śāntiṣu kāmapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svādhīnā tāmṛcaṃ no ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāyatrīṃ sarvaśūnyadām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.839'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratadviṣṇumantramirā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vatī dhenumatīti ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajamānaḥ svayaṃ prītyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitṛbhyo pravadettarām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.840'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhojanānte ca saṃpannaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pradadetpurataḥ sthitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tṛptāḥ stheti dvivāraṃ tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uktvā dadyāttadannakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='98'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.841'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatraiva vikiretpātra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>samīpe tatpuraḥ sthitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ucchiṣṭapiṇḍaṃ ca dadyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uttarāpośanaṃ tataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.842'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvāṇyetāni śiṣṭānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ācāreṇa na coktitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sūtrakārasya vedasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛte 'bhyudayamucyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.843'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akṛte pratyavāyo na</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punaranyāni kevalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tattatkriyāviśeṣeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tūṣṇīkaṃ vedamantrakaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.844'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atrānuktairmahākāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vilambo bādhakāya vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavedeva na sandehaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhamantro ya īritaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.845'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tanmātrasya samīcīna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>proktyai tatkarma sādhu vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavetkilānyathā taddhi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ bhavediti sādhubhiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.846'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samyagālocanīyo 'to</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāddhamantroktimātrataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvān kālavilambaḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvānevātra kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.847'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāmāṇiko hi tadbhinno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>'vihitaśca vidhānataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karmaṇo bādhakāyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhakāya bhavenna tu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.848'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmādvidvān sūtraveda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vihitaṃ yāvadeva vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvadeva prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvasaukhyāya kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.849'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ātmano brāhmaṇānāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhoktḥṇāṃ śāstravartmanaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>śāstravirodhi tyājyameva</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathāvadeva kurvītā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>-dhikaṃ śāstravirodhi yat</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.850'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvaṃ samyakparityājyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vihitaṃ yattadācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viprāṇāṃ bhojanātpaścāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tacchāstrādhikakṛtyataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='99'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.851'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samāgatātpunaḥ proktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkalpo nānyathācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apāṃ madhyena cācchindya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>darbhān mūlaiḥ sakṛddhataiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.852'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śundhantāṃ pitaraḥ prokṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āyantvityabhimantrya ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakṛdācchinnamantreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃstīryaiva tataḥ punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.853'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mārjayanteti mantreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato dadyāttilodakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakṛdācchinnadarbheṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>triṣu sthāneṣu tatparam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.854'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etatteti ca mantreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dadyātpiṇḍatrayaṃ punaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yanme māteti mantraṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitṛbhya iti vai punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.855'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atra pitaro 'mutra ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amī madamataḥ param</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ye samānāstato bhūyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena jātāstataḥ param</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.856'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vīraṃ dhatteti tatprāśyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>-ghrāya vā tatparaṃ punaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mārjayanteti mantreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvavacca tilodakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.857'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>datvāñjanābhyañjane ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāsaśchitvā vidhānataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>namo va iti mantreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>namaskārān samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.858'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhānna iti mantraṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ūrja vahantīmanuṃ tataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttiṣṭhata pitaro mano</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nvāhuveti mantrakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.859'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punarna iti bhūyaśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadantarikṣamiti vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mantrān japtvā krameṇaivaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>piṇḍāṃstānpūjayettataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.860'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitṛpiṇḍārcanaṃ yaistu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kriyate darbhapatrakaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṇḍulairakṣataiḥ puṣpais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tilairapi yavaistathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.861'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prīṇitāḥ pitarastena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvaccandrārkamedinī</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='100'/>
	    <note type='subheading'>putrakalatrādibhiḥ pitṛpradakṣiṇanamaskārāḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāsobhiḥ pūjayetpiṇḍān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathāśaktyā vicakṣaṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.862'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dakṣiṇābhiśca tāmbūlair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhūpadīpādibhistathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradakṣiṇanamaskāraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putrapautrādibhiḥ saha</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.863'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kalatraiḥ parivāraiśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na cettasya kulaṃ tarām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na vardhate kṣīyate ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāle kāle śanaiḥ śanaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.864'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ta eva piṇḍāḥ pitaras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadrūpeṇa sthitāḥ param</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaveyuḥ pūjanārthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nātra kāryā vicāraṇā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.865'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apratyakṣā hi pitaro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāyurūpaṃ samāśritāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāśarūpamāpannāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kālabhedeṣu santatam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.866'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nityamākāśarūpāste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāddhakāleṣu bhaktitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāhūtāstadā sadyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāyurūpaṃ samāśritāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.867'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samāyānti manovegāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>piṇḍakāle tu te punaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatpraviśyaiva putrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hitāya kṣaṇamañjasā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.868'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tiṣṭhanti kila tatpūjā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>svīkārāya tato yatan</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatpūjāṃ vidhinā kuryāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataścetputrakāmukaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>madhyamapiṇḍaṃ parimṛjya</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.869'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prayacchenmadhyamaṃ piṇḍaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharmapatnyai samantrakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādhatta pitaraśceti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ sā niyatā śuciḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.870'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pragṛhyāñjalinā bhaktyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṅmukhī maunamāśritā</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='101'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṃ prāśya vidhinācamya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatpaścāttu trirātrakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.871'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kurvantī bhojanaṃ bhartur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukteḥ paścātsakṛcchuciḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muditā harṣitātīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhitā malinā tathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.872'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāvayantī mahārudraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ kālaṃ ninayedapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvanmātreṇa ca tataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā putraṃ puṣkarasrajam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.873'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>labhate nātra sandeho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi sā syādrajasvalā</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>śrāddhadine śūdrabhojane</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na śūdraṃ bhojayecchrāddhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhe yatnena taddine</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.874'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāddhaśeṣaṃ na śūdrebhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na dadyāttu khaleṣvapi</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>pitṛbhojanapātrasya khananam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>piturucchiṣṭapātrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhe gopyāni kārayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.875'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khanitvaiva vinikṣipya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā śrāddhe na gocaram</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>sodakumbham</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛte 'kṛte vā sāpiṇḍye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātāpitroḥ parasya vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.876'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāpyannaṃ sodakumbhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dadyātsaṃvatsaraṃ dvijaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adaivaṃ pārvaṇaśrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sodakumbhamadharmakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.877'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kuryādābdikaparyantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkalpavidhinānvaham</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuryādaharahaḥ śrāddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>amāvāsyāṃ vinā sadā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.878'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatsodakalaśaśrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na kuryādanumāsike</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>prathamābde na tilatarpaṇam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prathamābde na kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tilatarpaṇamityapi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='102'/>
	  <note type='subheading'>sapiṇḍīkaraṇātparaṃ śrāddhāṅgatarpaṇam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.879'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadetattattu kathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vatsarābde sapiṇḍane</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekādaśe dvādaśe vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ yadi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.880'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtaṃ cettatpuraṃ samyak</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadyaḥ śrāddhāṅgatarpaṇam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kurvītaiva tathā darśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratimāsaṃ pṛthak pṛthak</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.881'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akṛte tarpaṇe bhūyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitarastasya kevalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaveyurduḥkhitā ghoraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punaḥ pretatvaśaṅkayā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.882'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣāṃ śaṅkānirāsāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māsikeṣvaṅgatarpaṇam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāddhānte vidhinā kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadya eva na saṃśayaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.883'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratimāsaṃ tadā darśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yacchrāddhaṃ tarpaṇādikam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asaṃśayaṃ prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na ceddoṣo mahān bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.884'>
