	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāddhamukteḥ paraṃ teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvijānāṃ karaśuddhaye</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tilairhastodakaṃ kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣaḍvāraṃ darbhapuñjataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.885'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cettatkaraśuddhiśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na bhavedeva kevalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madgotraṃ vardhatāṃ deva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitḥṇāṃ ca prasādataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.886'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti brāhmaṇapādeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saparyāṃ tāṃ tadācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśvedevaprasādaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitḥṇāṃ ca prasādakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.887'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svīkṛtya śirasā gṛhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devāśca pitarastataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svasti brūteti vācoktvā hy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>akṣayodakamityapi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.888'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>astvityapi ca taddhaste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śambaraṃ satilākṣatam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathākrameṇa dadyācca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vācayiṣye svadhāṃ tathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='103'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.889'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svāhāmapi ca saṃprārthya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vācyatāmiti taistataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃproktastu ṛce tveti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhārāṃ tāṃ pravadetparām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.890'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitṛbhyaśca prathamataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitāmahebhya eva ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prapitāmahebhyaśca tadvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svadhāstā vācyatāmiti</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.891'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bruvantu ca bhavanto vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>oṃ svadhāmiti vai vadet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃpadyantāṃ svadhāśceti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devāścāpi tathā punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.892'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prīyantāṃ pitaraḥ paścāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitāmahāstataḥ kila</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prapitāmahāśca pitaras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taddhaste salilaṃ kṣipet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>pitḥṇāṃ rajataṃ, devānāṃ svarṇam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.893'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śrāddhaikasādguṇya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>hetave dakṣiṇāṃ mudā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathāśaktyā pradadyācca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitḥṇāṃ rajataṃ param</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.894'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hiraṇyaṃ cāpi devānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vājevājeti vai vadet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttiṣṭhateti pitaraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anugacchantu devatāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.895'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityudvāsya tu tān paścād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>annaśeṣo 'khilaḥ punaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kriyatāṃ kimiti prokte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ceṣṭaiḥ sa upabhujyatām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.896'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityuktastu tato bhūyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāduṣaṁ sada ityataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upasthānaṃ pitḥṇāṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuryātprāñjalinā dvijaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.897'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣāṃ tāmāśiṣaṃ gṛhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praṇipatya vidhānataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anuvrajya vidhānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svagṛhasyāntime tyajet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.898'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cetsarvatra tāḥ proktāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parā vyāhṛtayaḥ śivāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na cettu vāmadevāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantraṃ paramamuttamam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='104'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.899'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pravadettena manunā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadyadvaiguṇyamāgatam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karmamadhye paitṛke 'smin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jñānājñānata eva vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.900'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kartṛbhoktṛmahādoṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dravyakālādisaṃbhavāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lobhamohājñānacitta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāyakṛtyaviśeṣajāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.901'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāparādhāḥ sukrūrāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parīhāraikavarjitāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te sarve smaraṇāttasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāmantrasya vaibhavāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.902'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadyo vilayamāyānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karmasādguṇyamapyati</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhavetsadya evaivaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmāttu manumuttamam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.903'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>namodvādaśasaṃyuktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paṭhanīyaṃ sakṛtkila</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvanmātreṇa tatkarma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paramaṃ tṛptikārakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.904'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>acchidraṃ sadguṇaṃ sāṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikalaikavivarjitam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratyavāyaikarahitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gayāśrāddhaśatādhikam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.905'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavatyeva na sandehas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmāttanmantramuccaret</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>ucchiṣṭādi śrāddhe sapta pavitrāṇi</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ucchiṣṭaṃ śivanirmālyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vamanaṃ pretaparpaṭam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.906'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāddhe sapta pavitrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dauhitraḥ kutapastilāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>payaso vatsapītatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ucchiṣṭamiti nāma tat</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.907'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhagīrathaprārthanayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadgaṅgātyavalepahā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tirodhānaṃ jaṭāraṇye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtvā tāmadharadyataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.908'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tannirmālyaṃ tato gaṅgā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā prītyai paramā smṛtā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā nityaśuddhā tadyogād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgā patitapāvanī</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='105'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.909'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirdoṣā saiva kathitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadbhinnā sapta yāśca tāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśuddhāśca kadācitsyuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śivāṅgapatitā tu sā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.910'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atyantaikapavitrā hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānyā vai tatsamā sarit</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadīyodakasaṃbandhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatpitryaṃ karma tattu vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.911'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apavitrasahasrebhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktaṃ sadyo bhaviṣyati</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitaro nityatṛptāste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naṣṭakṣutkāḥ pitāmahāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.912'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pārameśvarasāyujyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labhante prapitāmahāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apyanye kulajā eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>syuste kulasahasrakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.913'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taccāpi vaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatkṣaṇātprāpitaṃ bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trirātraphaladā nadyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puṇye tadayanadvaye</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.914'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ardhodaye mahodaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cakrike grahaṇe tathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padmakāpilaṣaṣṭhyāṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punaranyeṣu tāḥ punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.915'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidhiprayatnaracitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>'vagāhanajapādikaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phalapradā hi sarito</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tathā jāhnavī śivā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.916'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>darśanasparśanadhyānair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jantūnāṃ janmamocanī</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taduttarakṣaṇādgaṅgā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadbhārgatanusaṃbhavā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.917'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siṃhakarkaṭayormadhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvā nadyo rajasvalāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dinatrayamasaṃspṛśyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatrādau yāḥ saridvarāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>mahānadyaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.918'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>godāvarī bhīmarathī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tuṅgabhadrā ca veṇikā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāpī payoṣṇī divyā syur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dakṣiṇe tu saridvarāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.919'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāvanī narmadā caiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yamunā ca mahānadī</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='106'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarasvatī viśokā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vitastā ca tathā punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.920'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dakṣiṇāyanakāle tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃprāpte cāvagāhanāt</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paraṃ tridinaparyantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaveyustā rajasvalāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.921'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na tu sā śambhusaṃbandhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nityaśuddhā prakīrtitā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāhnavī saritāṃ mukhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvalokaikapāvanī</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.922'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hlādanī pāvanī kāmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāmanīyā kalāvatī</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karakā kaluṣaghnī yā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāgāścaitāsturīyakāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.923'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>divasāt prabhṛti proktās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tisro rātrī rajasvalāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saptamīprabhṛti hyevaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saritaḥ kāścanāparāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.924'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nalinī nirmalā nārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gurvī garbhā garā dharā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣurikā kāśikā śyāmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daśa proktā rajasvalāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.925'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dāridryanāśinī deyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāhudā bahulā balā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarmiṣṭhā śayanā svāpā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nava nadyo rajasvalāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.926'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daśamīprabhṛti proktās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tisro rātrīrmanīṣibhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taptā tāpā tāpasā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśvāmitrā bṛhadvarā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.927'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhenā senā sanā somā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nava nadyo rajasvalāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trayodaśīprabhṛtyetā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathitāstā rajasvalāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.928'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kalikā varuṇā vāmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>somadā mahilā kalā</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='107'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvaritā lulitā tārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣoḍaśaprabhṛti smṛtāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.929'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tisro rātrīrāpagāstā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāśuddhā rajasvalāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gārutmatā gatimatī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gatidā gaṇavāritā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.930'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guṇāḍhyā guṇadā śeṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sapta nadyaḥ prakīrtitāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekonaviṃśatidina</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhṛtyetā rajasvalāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.931'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śātadruśca śatadruśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varaṇī vāruṇī rasā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hiraṇyadā haimavatī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gajavāsī manasvinī</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.932'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rajasvalā navaitāḥ syur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvāviṃśatidināditaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karatoyā kālatoyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varṣatoyā saradrasā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.933'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>antarjalā kheyatoyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bṛhattoyā sravajjalā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pañcaviṃśatyādito vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vijñeyāstā rajasvalāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.934'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṣṭāviṃśatprabhṛti vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāḥ kāścana janaiḥ kila</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nadīti nityaṃ kathyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khanyante ca tadā tadā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.935'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nadīgāḥ sindhugā vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parvatādisamudbhavāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatra kutrāpi vā jātāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣudrā dīrghā jalairyutāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.936'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varṣājalāśca khanana</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jalā lavaṇaśambarāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvāstāḥ kathitāḥ sadbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māsānte syū rajasvalāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.937'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśeṣeṇādhunā proktāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvāsāṃ saritāmapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasaṃgāttatsvarūpasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māhātmyaṃ ca tathāvidham</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.938'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaprāyaṃ vijānīyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yā vā nityajalāḥ punaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttamā iti tāḥ proktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nadīnāṃ sindhusaṃgataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.939'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādhikyaṃ tatprakathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puṇyakṣetrādinā tathā</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='108'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣetraṃ cāpi tathā jñeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nadīyugmaikamelanāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.940'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khananotpannasalilā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tannyūnā kathitā tathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khananāccādhikajalā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tacchreṣṭhā vai smṛtākhilaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.941'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pañcayojanaparyanta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravahatsalilottamā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utpattiprabhṛtisthairya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vahatsalilasaṃyutā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.942'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paramā cottamā ceti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā gaṅgeti ca phaṇyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nadīnāṃ pravarā gaṅgā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tajjalaṃ śrāddhakarmaṇi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.943'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāvanaṃ paramaṃ proktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vamanaṃ madhu cocyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatpretaparpaṭaṃ sākṣāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitḥṇāṃ duḥkhavārakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.944'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khaḍgapātraṃ hi kutapo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dauhitro vā punaḥ smṛtaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śivanirmālyataḥ śrāddha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaiguṇyaṃ tatpraśāmyati</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.945'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punaḥkaraṇasaṃprāptau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śivanirmālyayogataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pranaṣṭaḥ prabhaveddoṣas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>te cātrāpi vadāmyuta</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>punaḥśrāddhaprakaraṇam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.946'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vipravāntāvagnināśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>piṇḍe ca vidalīkṛte</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>piṇḍagolakasaṃyoge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīpanāśe tathaiva ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.947'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rajasvalānāthabhuktau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhipūrvaṃ tathaiva ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśaucabhuktāvāśauci</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃsparśe homavismṛtau</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.948'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atithau taddinabhrāntyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkalpakaraṇe 'pi vā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekasminneva divase</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitrorvyatyāsataḥ kṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.949'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taddine copavāsaḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punaḥ śrāddhaṃ pare 'hani</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='109'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādyaśrāddhe tu bhuñjāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>viprasya vamanaṃ yadi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.950'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatte kṛṣṇeti mantreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>homaṃ kuryādyathāvidhi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṣoḍaśaśrāddhabhuñjāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇastu vamedyadi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.951'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pretāhutistu kartavyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>laukikāgnau yathāvidhi</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>anumāsikādyucchiṣṭavamane</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anumāsike 'tra kartavya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ucchiṣṭe vamanaṃ yadi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.952'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kabale tu subhuñjāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tṛptiṃ caiva vinirdiśet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amāvāsyāmāsike ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇo mukhaniḥsrutam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.953'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā mahālayaśrāddhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitrādervamanaṃ yadi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitāmahādivatkṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhaśeṣaṃ samāpayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>ucchiṣṭocchiṣṭasaṃsparśe</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.954'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ucchiṣṭena tu saṃspṛṣṭo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhuñjānaḥ śrāddhakarmaṇi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śeṣamannaṃ tu nāśnīyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kartuḥ śrāddhasya kā gatiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.955'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatsthānanāmagotreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hmāsanādi tathārcayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>annatyāgaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāvake juhuyāccarum</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.956'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puruṣasūktena juhuyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvaddvātriṃśadāhutiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>homaśeṣaṃ samāpyātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhaśeṣaṃ samāpayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.957'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akṛtvā tu samīpe tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇe vamanaṃ yadi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punaḥ pākaṃ prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>piṇḍadānaṃ yathāvidhi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.958'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ucchiṣṭasparśanaṃ jñātvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatpātraṃ ca vihāya ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatpātraṃ parihatyātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhūmiṃ samanulipya ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='110'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.959'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya śīghraṃ vidhāyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvamannaṃ praveṣṭayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pariṣicya tataḥ paścād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhojayecca na doṣakṛt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>anyonyasparśe</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.960'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāddhapaṅktau tu bhuñjānāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyonyaṃ spṛśato yadi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvau viprau visṛjedannaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.961'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ucchiṣṭocchiṣṭasaṃsparśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śunā śūdreṇa vā tathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upoṣya rajanīmekāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañcagavyena śudhyati</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.962'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>indrāya somasūktena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāddhavighno yadā bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agnyādibhirbhojanena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhaṃ saṃpūrṇameva hi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.963'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>indrāya somasūktena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhojaneneti ca trayam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidhānaṃ kathitaṃ samyag</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyavasthā hyatra cocyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.964'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>piṇḍadānātparaṃ yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kasyacidbrāhmaṇasya vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vamanācchrāddhavighne tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā sūktajapāddhi sā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.965'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāddhasaṃpūrṇatā jñeyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatpūrvaṃ cettu daivake</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>pitāmahaviṣṇuvamane</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitāmahe tatparasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣṇvā vā vamane yadi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.966'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>homenaiva tadā jñeyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvayoryadi tadā punaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatsūktajapahomābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhasaṃpūrṇatā smṛtā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>darśādau chardane</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.967'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitṛsthānasya viprasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vamane yadi darśake</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punaḥ pākena tacchrāddha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhojanaṃ vihitaṃ tadā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='111'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.968'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ābdike vānumāse vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taddinopoṣaṇaṃ bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pare 'hani punaḥśrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhojanenaiva nānyathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.969'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eka eva yadā vipro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhonane chardito yadi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ābdike tu pare 'hnyeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>darśe vā yadi māsike</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.970'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathaivāgniṃ samādhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>homaṃ kuryādyathāvidhi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatsthānanāmagotreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cāsanādi samarcayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.971'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>annatyāgaṃ prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato 'gnau juhuyāccarum</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāṇādipañcabhirmantrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāvaddvātriṃśadāhutiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.972'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>homaśeṣaṃ samāpyātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāddhaśeṣaṃ samāpayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punaḥ pākena sadyo vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhasya karaṇaṃ smṛtam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.973'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>darśādiṣveva kathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na pratyabde kathaṃcana</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratyabdasya pare 'hnyeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthānaṃ viprasya tatsmṛtam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  
	  <note type='subheading'>upavāsārthaḥ</note>
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.974'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upāvṛttistu pākebhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yastu vāso guṇaiḥ saha</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.975'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upavāsaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvabhogavivarjitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>aputrāsāpiṇḍyam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patnyāḥ kuryādaputrāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patyurmātrādibhiḥ saha</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.976'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāpiṇḍyamanuyāne tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>janakena sahātmajaḥ.</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>anugamane</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛtaṃ yānugatā nāthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā tena saha piṇḍanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='112'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.977'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arhati svargavāse 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>strīpiṇḍaṃ bhartṛpiṇḍena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃyujya vidhivatpunaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.978'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tredhā vibhajya tatpiṇḍaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣipenmātrādiṣu triṣu</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhartuḥ pitrādibhiḥ kuryād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartrā patnyāstathaiva ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.979'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sapatnyā vā 'sapatnyā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na bheda iti gobhilaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>ekādaśe 'hani ṣoḍaśam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kecidatra pṛthakprocus</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ pakṣaṃ pravadāmyaham</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.980'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekacityāṃ samārūḍhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dampatī nidhanaṃ gatau</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekoddiṣṭaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛthagekādaśe 'hani</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.981'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvādaśe 'hani saṃprāpte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>piṇḍamekaṃ dvayoḥ kṣipet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitāmahādipiṇḍeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ piturviniyojayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.982'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kecittameva piṇḍaṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvedhā kṛtvā tataḥ param</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udagbhāgagataṃ piṇḍaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitṛvarge niyojayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.983'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaṃ dakṣiṇasthitaṃ piṇḍaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātṛvarge niyojayet</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>taddine paredyurvā sahagamane śrāddham</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atra kecitpunaḥ procuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakārāntarataḥ kila</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.984'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taddine vā paredyurvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartāramanugacchati</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhartrā sahaiva śuddhiḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhaṃ caikadine bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.985'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paitṛkaṃ maraṇaṃ yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadevāhuḥ pradhānakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kecittu mātṛkaṃ prāhur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>evaṃ pakṣadvayaṃ smṛtam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='113'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.986'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pracetā atra covāca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svamataṃ tatpravacmyaham</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhartrā saha pramītāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛte 'hanyapare 'hni vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.987'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āśaucaṃ maraṇoddiśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dahanādi tayorna tu</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punaḥ pakṣāntaraṃ proktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaiścittatra maharṣibhiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.988'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pativratā tvanyadine 'nugacched</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yā strī paticittyadhirohaṇena</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daśāhato bharturaghasya śuddhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhadvayaṃ syātpṛthagekakāle</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>tayorāśauce maraṇādi</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.989'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartāramanugacchantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>patnī cedārtavā yadi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tailadroṇyāṃ vinikṣipya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lavaṇe vā svakaṃ patim</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.990'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paraṃ trirātrāddahanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuryuste bāndhavāstayā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāddhaṃ caikadine kuryur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvayorapi hi nirṇayaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.991'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekoddiṣṭaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bharturekādaśe 'hani</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvādaśe 'hani saṃprāpte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>piṇḍamekaṃ dvayoḥ kṣipet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.992'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitāmahādipiṇḍeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ piturviniyojayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brahmavādimataṃ bhūyas tv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyadvakṣyāmi śobhanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.993'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dahyamānaṃ tu bhartāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā nārī pativratā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anugacchettayoḥ śrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛthagekādaśe 'hani</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.994'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śilāpratiṣṭhāpanādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtyaṃ sarvaṃ pṛthak pṛthak</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekatraiva prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>piturmātuḥ samantrakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.995'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣoḍaśāntaṃ pṛthakkṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāpiṇḍyaṃ dvādaśe 'hani</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pretatvāttu vimuktena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saha mātuḥ sapiṇḍakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='114'/>
	  <note type='subheading'>tatpiṇḍasaṃyojanam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.996'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>strīpiṇḍaṃ bhartṛpiṇḍena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃyujya vidhivatpunaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tredhā vibhajya taṃ piṇḍaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣipenmātrādiṣu triṣu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>mātuḥ sāpiṇḍyābhāvasthalam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.997'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atra viṣṇurmataṃ svasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sulabhāyāvadatkila</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛte pituḥ sapiṇḍatve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātustu na sapiṇḍanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.998'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitureva sapiṇḍatve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyā api kṛtaṃ bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>strīṇāṃ pṛthaṅ na kartavyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapiṇḍīkaraṇakriyā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>dattena pālakapituḥ sāpiṇḍyam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.999'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyagotrapradattaścet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanayaḥ svapitustataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pālakasya prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatpitrādisapiṇḍanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>dattaputrakṛtyam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1000'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vivādo nātra ko 'pyasti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tādṛgdattasutaḥ pituḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayaṃ tadbhinnagotro 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadgotre yojayecca tam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1001'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitāmahādibhiḥ samyak</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatprācīnaikagotrakaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattapautrasya pitaraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prapitāmahamukhyakaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1002'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tyaktvā pitāmahaṃ tvanya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>gotraṃ samyak tataḥ param</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yojayennātra sandehas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tajjaṃ tatprapitāmaham</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1003'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tyaktvā samyagvicāyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svagotraireva yojanam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuryāttadvidhinā no cet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitḥṇāṃ saṃkaro bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1004'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena doṣaśca sumahān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhavedeva durghaṭaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='115'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattaputrodbhavo yatnāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapiṇḍīkaraṇe pituḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1005'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tyajetpitāmahaṃ yatnāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatputraḥ prapitāmaham</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatputraścettato vṛddha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>prapitāmahameva vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1006'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ mātuḥ sapiṇḍe tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattaputrodbhavaścaret</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>anyagotradattaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadyanyagotrajo dattaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>santatau tatparaṃparām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1007'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>catuṣkulaikaparyantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātānāṃ saṅkaṭaṃ mahat</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmin sapiṇḍīkaraṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadānīṃ samupasthite</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1008'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavatyeva hi tatpaścāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pañcamādi yathākramam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayameva bhavettāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadvarge janmināṃ mahat</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1009'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avekṣaṇaṃ jāgarūka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>-tā ca nitye smṛte tarām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmātsagotre tanayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃgṛhṇīyādaputrakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1010'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ pūrvameva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā samyaṅ nirūpitam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putre jāte tato bhūyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putrasvīkaraṇādatha</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1011'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jāto 'dhikaḥ pradattāttu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharmataḥ sarvakarmasu</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>pituḥ śrāddhasya ṣaṇmāsāt pūrvaṃ prabhṛti kṛtyam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitroḥ śrāddhasya ṣaṇmāsāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvameva tadā tadā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1012'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāddhasmṛtiṃ prakurvanvai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathāḥ kāścana santatam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakurvan svajanaistiṣṭhed</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iṣṭān kāṃścidviśeṣakān</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1013'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tilamāṣavrīhiyavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guḍamudgādikān madhu</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='116'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kandamūlādikān kāṃścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vastrakārpāsakādikān</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1014'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃgṛhya sthāpayedyatnād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divyacandanakhaṇḍakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divyośīraṃ gugguluṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nikṣipeccāvanītale</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1015'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śuṣkān śalāṭukān kāṃścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gopayecchrāddhahetave</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛkṣeṣu kāṃścidyatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhūmyantarbhūtale tathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1016'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kusūleṣu dukūleṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punaḥ kumbhaghaṭeṣu ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthāpayennikṣipedevaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nikhanetkāṃścidapyuta</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1017'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samīcīnāni vastūni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭamātrāṇi cettadā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāddhārthamiti niścitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>proktvā svīyaiśca kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1018'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gopayitvaiva yatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthāpayetpālayedapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taduktitatkathātṛptāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitaro nityameva vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1019'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āśīrbhirenaṃ satataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vardhayantyapi tāritāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>kathātṛptiḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavanti kathayā svarge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitṛloke ca te 'niśam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1020'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathayā tṛptireteṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>smṛtyoktyā vacanādapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadīyakṛtyasaṃbhāṣā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyavastupracāraṇaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>vidyamānāgnirapi tridinātpūrvaṃ punaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1021'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatnāddinatrayātpūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyamānāgnirapyalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punaḥsaṃdhānavidhinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhāyāgniṃ susaṃskriyāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>śrāddhadine varjyam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1022'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aupāsanaṃ vinā homam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyaṃ homaṃ tu taddine</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kuryādeva vidhinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yadi kuryāttu tatpatet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='117'/>
	  <note type='subheading'>śrāddhadine dānajapādi na kartavyam</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1023'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dānādhyayanadevārcā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>japahomavratādikān</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kuryācchrāddhadivase</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāgviprāṇāṃ visarjanāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1024'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na dadyādyācamānebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>phalapuṣpajalākṣatān</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṇḍulān dadhitakrājya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śākapātratṛṇasthalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1025'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāṣṭhamūlakandabhāṇḍa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyāpustakabhūṣaṇam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṛṇamevaṃ dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>celaṃ vā 'nugrahādikam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1026'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kalyāṇavārtākopādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>cāṭupāruṣyabhāṣaṇam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bālanigrahatadgrāha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatsallāpādi varjayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1027'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uccaiḥ saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ hasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāḍanaṃ hasanaṃ vṛthā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durālāpaṃ duṣṭaloka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāṣaṇaṃ duṣṭaśikṣaṇam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1028'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>naitāni kuryādyatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyabde tu viśeṣataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>mṛtāhe darśe</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>darśādiṣu mṛtāhaścen</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛtāhaṃ pūrvamācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1029'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paścāddarśaṃ prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitrorevāyamucyate</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>mṛtāhe mātāmahādiśrāddhasaṃbhave</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātāmahasya tatpatnyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāpatnīmātureva ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1030'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pituḥ śrāddhasamatvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>procuḥ kila maharṣayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>darśe samāgataṃ manvā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>-dikaṃ śrāddhaṃ samācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1031'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>darśasiddhistāvatā syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daivataikyena kevalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sapiṇḍakamapiṇḍaṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daivataikye pṛthaṅ na tu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1032'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāryaṃ bhavati tacchrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhinnadaivatake punaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='118'/>
	    <note type='subheading'>nityanaimittike prāpte</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrvaṃ naimittikaṃ kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyabde yadi tattadā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1033'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyabdamāgataṃ pratyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sattiyogavaśāccaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pituḥ śrāddhaṃ prathamato</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātuḥ śrāddhaṃ tataḥ param</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1034'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paścānmātāmahasyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatpatnyāśca tataḥ param</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paścātsapatnīmātuḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścātpatnyā prakīrtitam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1035'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sutabhrātṛpitṛvyāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātulādikramātsmṛtam</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>darśe bahuśrāddhasaṃbhave</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitrādibhinnaśrāddhānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāruṇyānāṃ yadā punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1036'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>darśādiṣvāgatānāṃ cen</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛtāhānāṃ tadā param</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>darśādikaṃ samāpyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāruṇyaśrāddhamācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1037'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kecitpatnyāḥ pitṛvyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatpatnyāśca samāgamam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>darśādiṣu mṛtāhaṃ vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ param</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1038'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>darśādikamanuṣṭheyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti procuśca tatkṛtau</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmādyathāruciparam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmatṛptiḥ praśasyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1039'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vastuto 'tra punarvacmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛvyo yadi kevalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etasya paramo mukhyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatpatnī vāpi patnyapi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1040'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātṛtvakāryakāraṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahatī sumahatyapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā cettanmṛtāhaṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='119'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1041'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>darśādikaṃ prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na cette kevalā yadi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāmamātreṇa kathitās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā darśādikaṃ purā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1042'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtvaiva paścāttacchrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāruṇyānāmiti sthitiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvatraivaṃ prakathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāminaḥ sakhyureva vā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1043'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>purohitācāryayośca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyāsattiprabhedataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāddhasya karaṇaṃ proktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punarapyupakāriṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1044'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣāṃ teṣāṃ kriyābhedāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chrāddhānuṣṭhānamucyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvatraivātmatuṣṭiḥ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viduṣaḥ paramottamā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>keṣāṃcitkalpaprakāraḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1045'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punarviśeṣaḥ ko 'pyasti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravakṣyāmyatra taṃ punaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatastāto yato vṛttir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yato jīvo yataḥ prasūḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1046'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa svīkṛtaḥ śrāddhatithir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhraṣṭatyaktapitāpi vā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>darśādiśrāddhaparato</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛtāhaśrāddhamācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1047'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitrātyantaikakalahe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhāvanāvasare sute</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāte naṣṭe ca pitari</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā mātari tatparam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1048'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alpakālamṛtāyāṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tattadgrāmasthitairapi</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā tadā pālito yo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daivājjīvanpravardhitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1049'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭamātrairbālya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viprabudhyaiva taistarām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃskṛtaścādhyāpitaśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jñātājñātaikagotrakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1050'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ajñātagrāmatātādir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jñātajātirjanoktitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='120'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato vidvān mahātmā yo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatastāta iti smṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1051'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evameva tathānyo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathāvasthāprabhedataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatotpattistu kathitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ajñātagrāmasaṃbhavaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1052'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svajīvanaprakāraṃ yo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bālye dvādaśavārṣikāt</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na vetti naṣṭajanako</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatotpattistu kathyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1053'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātaraṃ yo na jānāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svakīyajanaśūnyataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā pitrādikān sarvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>procyate 'sau yataḥ prasūḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1054'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ta ete kila sarvepi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vipatkālasamudbhavāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naṣṭapitrādikajanā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daivātsaṃprāptajīvanāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1055'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaiśca kaiściddṛṣṭamātrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viprabudhyaikapālitaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avasthābhedataḥ sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tattannāmāṅkitāḥ smṛtāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1056'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>catvāraḥ kathitāḥ sadbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atiduḥkhaikajīvitam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atibālye tato bhūyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yauvane prāptasaṃpadaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1057'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daivayogena vidvāṃsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karmaṭhāścāpi vā bhavan</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>piturmṛtatithiṃ yo vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jñātvā bālyena kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1058'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayameva śrāddhahetor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mārgaśīrṣe hyamādikam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāstradṛṣṭyā samālocya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadbhirukto 'thavā gṛṇan</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1059'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svasvīkṛtaśrāddhatithir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ucyate brahmavādibhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>bhraṣṭakriyā</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madyapānādinā bhraṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitā yasya babhūva vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1060'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛtestasya paraṃ proṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caturviṃśativārṣikam</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='121'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhraṣṭakriyā prakartavyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putreṇa vidinātmanā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1061'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya śrāddhaṃ tataḥ kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tādṛśasya durātmanaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tādṛkpitṛkriyākartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa u bhraṣṭapitā smṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1062'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitustu bhraṃśamātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāyaṃ bhraṣṭapitā bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tādṛkkarmaikakaraṇa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>samayādatha tādṛśaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>sarvathā patitasya pañcaviṃśadvarṣātparaṃ kriyārambhaḥ</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1063'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavatyapi tathā tyakta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitā cāpi prakathyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayaṃ caṇḍālatāṃ budhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpto yo svajanairapi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1064'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahiṣkṛtaśca saṃtyaktas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tādṛśaṃ pitaraṃ mṛtam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pañcaviṃśativarṣebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paraṃ putraḥ sa śāstrataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1065'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣaḍabdaṃ ṣaḍguṇatvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṣayitvātikṛcchrakaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahākṛcchraistaptakṛcchraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parākātiśatairapi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1066'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cāpāgrasnānaśanakair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantrakumbhasahasrakaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gosahasrairvidhānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃskuryāttasya kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1067'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratisaṃvatsaraṃ paścāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tādṛkcchrāddhakarastu yaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa u tyaktapitā jñeyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ta ete tanayāḥ sadā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1068'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃjātīyakā ye syus</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>te sarve dharmatatparāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>darśādiśrāddhaparato</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛtāhaśrādvamācaret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1069'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣāṃ śrāddhaikakaraṇam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>eteṣāṃ svasya kevalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratyavāyaikaśūnyāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na ceddoṣo mahān bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1070'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatsaṃbhūtamahādoṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>parihārāya vā na cet</seg> /</l>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='122'/>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāptaye karmaṭhatvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na cedasya tu kevalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1071'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāddhatyāgāt pratyavāyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavettasmāttathā<orig>''</orig>caret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nityaṃ teṣāṃ mṛtāheṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dānadharmādikaṃ caret</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1072'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viprāṇāṃ bhojanātpūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niyamo 'yamudāhṛtaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durātmanāṃ viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvavaddoṣaśāntaye</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1073'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāddhamukteḥ paraṃ teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na kuryādbhūribhojanam</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>śrāddhāṅgatarpaṇaṃ pare 'hani</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paredyurvā prayatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhāṅgatilatarpaṇam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1074'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadya eva prakartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvaṃ paścāttu vā tathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhiśravaṇamevaṃ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ekenaiva hi kāritam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1075'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nānnasūktaṃ tyāgakāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prācīnāvītikaṃ na tu</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agnaukaraṇahome 'piṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taccāvaśyakamucyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1076'>
	    <note type='subheading'>uddeśatyāgakāle savyam</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uddeśatyāgakāle ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>savyameva bhaveddhi vai</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>madhuvātādyante na</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madhuvātādikaṃ mukter</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ante naiva vadedapi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>vikiraṃ na kuryāt</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1077'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vikiraṃ naiva kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nityakarmāṇi yāni vā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāni sarvāṇi sarvatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhṛtvā puṇḍraṃ vidhānataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='123'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1078'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niveditānnataḥ pañca</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yajñānte 'tithipūjanāt</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrvaṃ teṣāṃ prakartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyabdādikakarma vai</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1079'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣāṃ śrāddhe tyāgamātrāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛte sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>vamane</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>api prāpte 'pi vamane</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitṛsthānasya vā kimu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1080'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na punaḥ karaṇaṃ kuryāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chrāddhaśeṣaṃ samāpayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pādaprakṣālane teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maṇḍalānarcanaṃ bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1081'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pādaprakṣālanārthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pradeyamudakaṃ param</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ta ete nikhilā dharmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛtāhe kevalaṃ smṛtāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1082'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na darśādiṣu vijñeyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra dharmā yathoktitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakartavyā viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vikāro 'tyantakutsitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1083'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛtāha eva kathito</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānyato yatra kutracit</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāddhānte vā paredyurvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śakto yaḥ pitṛkarmaṇi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1084'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na kuryānmohatastūṣṇīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viprāṇāṃ bhūribhojanam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ardhatṛptā hi pitaro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaveyurnātra saṃśayaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>karturbhojanābhāve</note>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1085'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā tu yo mūḍho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na bhuṅkte pitṛsevitam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iṣṭaiḥ putrairbandhubhiśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇairbahmavādibhiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='subheading'>ācāyairgurubhiḥ sadbhirāgatābhyāgatairapi</note>
	  
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1086'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitaro naiva tṛptāḥ syur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhuñjīyāttena tṛptitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  
	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1087'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadvaṃśyānāmarbhakāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viprabhukteranantaram</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatkāṃkṣitāni vastūni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhakṣyādīni phalānyapi</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='124'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1088'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svacchandanaḥ pradeyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāvanmātreṇa te param</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atituṣṭā mahātuṣṭāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parituṣṭāḥ praharṣitāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1089'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pūjitāśca bhaviṣyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmādbālamanoratham</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrayetpitṛtṛptyarthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taddineṣu viśeṣataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1090'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tṛptāḥ stheti tathā prokte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trivāraṃ pitṛsūnunā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāvayanti tadā taṃ vai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cetasā tu vayaṃ tathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1091'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tṛptā jātāstathā tvaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tṛpto yadi tadā vayam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tṛptā bhūma na cenno 'dya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kā tṛptiriti vai tarām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1092'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dūyamānana manasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tiṣṭhanti kila tena vai</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samyagbhuñjīta vai pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā kurvan bhujikriyām</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1093'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atṛptā eva no te syur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iṣṭaiḥ putraiśca bandhubhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viprālaṃkaraṇe jāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhālaṃkaraṇaṃ bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1094'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>patnyādīnāmalaṃkāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiṣṭabrāhmaṇabhojanam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anveva bhojanaṃ taṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taddine kriyate tu yat</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1095'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatsarvaṃ prītaye teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavedevaṃ na cānyathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadvā tadvā prakartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tattatsarvaṃ prayatnataḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1096'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anantaraṃ viprabhukteḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitrudvāmanataḥ param</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatpūrvaṃ lavamātraṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vastu kiñcidapi svayam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1097'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na dadyācchrāddhakṛdvācā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāsyāmīti vadenna vā</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>tiladroṇavrayaḥ</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiladroṇavrayaṃ kuryāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taddine samupasthite</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='125'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1098'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhakṣyāstilamayāḥ kāryās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tilakalkaṃ viśeṣataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tilacūrṇaṃ tailapiṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tilabharjanamapyuta</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1099'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tilārcanaṃ tilamukhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rakṣohananamācaret</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tilairvikiraṇaṃ kuryād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dravyalopeṣu kṛtsnaśaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1100'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samīcīnaṃ tilaiḥ kuryāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tilāḥ syuḥ somadevatāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>somaḥ pitḥṇāmādhāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>somāyaiva tu hūyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1101'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'yaṃ hi pitṛbhiḥ prītas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taddattaṃ kavyamuttamam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>somatṛptyaikajanakaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmātsomahutaṃ haviḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1102'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatkalāvṛddhijanakaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā kalā pīyate hi taiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasvādibhiḥ pitṛbhistu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadeva tattilaiḥ sadā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1103'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvaśrāddheṣu pitaraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūjanīyā viśeṣataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>darśaśrāddhaṃ tarpaṇasvarūpeṇa</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvābhāve viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tilairjalavimiśritaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1104'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>darśādikāni śrāddhāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryāṇyeva samantrataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svadhā namastarpayāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitaraṃ ca pitāmaham</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1105'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prapitāmahamevaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasvādikamayāṃstathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāmagotraikasaṃyuktān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāddhaṃ kṛtvāpi tatparam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1106'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadaṅgatarpaṇaṃ kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛtasyādau tilodakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samārabhya kriyāḥ kāryās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmātsantastilodakam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1107'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prayamaśrāddhamevocuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrāddhapratividhitvataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadevocuśca nikhilā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>durbalānāṃ hitecchavaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='126'/>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1108'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samālokyaiva śāstrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutimūlāni te purā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manvādayo mahātmānas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tilā syustādṛśāḥ kila</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1109'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satilairvidyate śrāddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vinā sarvatra kevalam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mukhyadravyaistilairadbhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paitṛkaṃ nikhilaṃ bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1110'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāmādyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āpa eva viśeṣataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paramāḥ kāraṇānīha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmādbrāhmaṇapuṃgavāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1111'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apa eva samāśritya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṣante toyadā mahat</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jalaṃ tatraiva vartante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadeva paramaṃ sthalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1112'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prabhūtaidhodakagrāmaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvadeśottamottamaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nadītīraṃ viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tacchatādhikamucyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>

	  <lg xml:id='Ang_1.1113'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatraiva sakalā dharmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anuṣṭheyā hi santatam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nadī ca sajalā jñeyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tacchūnyā kadācana</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <p>iti āṅgirasam |</p>

	  <p>ityāṅgirasasmṛtau pūrvāṅgirasaṃ samāptam |</p>
	</div>

	<pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='127'/>
	<div type='part' n='2'>
	  <head>uttarāṅgirasam</head>
	  <div type='adhyāya' n='1'>
	    <head>prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ</head>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.1.1'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśvarūpaṃ namaskṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devaṃ tribhuvaneśvaram</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmasya darśanārthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅgirā idamabravīt</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.1.2'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha trayāṇāṃ vakṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pramāṇaṃ vidhimāditaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmasya parṣadaścaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaścittakramasya ca</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.1.3'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāyaścittaṃ catuṣpādaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vihitaṃ dharmakartṛbhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pariṣaddaśadhā proktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trividhā vā samāsataḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.1.4'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pramāṇābhihitaṃ yattu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvamaṅgirasā tadā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aprameyapramāṇasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhenādhigamo bhavet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.1.5'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmādaṅgirasā puṇyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharmaśāstramidaṃ kṛtam</seg> /</l>
	      <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='128'/>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upasthānavranādeśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>caryāśuddhiprakāśanam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.1.6'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa dharmastu kṛto jñeyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svādhiṣṭhānaka eva vai</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caturbhiḥ sādhanaiścaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmaḥ proktaḥ sanātanaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.1.7'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtvā pūrvamudāhārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathoktaṃ dharmakartṛbhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paścātkāryānusāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaktyā kuryuranugraham</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.1.8'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatpūrvamṛṣibhiḥ proktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharmaśāstramanuttamam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatpramāṇaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lokadharmānuvarṇanam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.1.9'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na hi teṣāmatikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vacanāni mahātmanām</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajñānairapi vidvadbhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śakyamanyatprabhāṣitum</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.1.10'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svābhiprāyakṛtaṃ karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidhivijñānavarjitam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīḍākarmeva bālānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatsarvaṃ syānnirarthakam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <p>ityaṅgirasadharmaśāstre upoddhāto nāma prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ</p>
	  </div>
	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='129'/>
	  <div type='adhyāya' n='2'>
	    <head>dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ</head>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.2.1'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>copasthānasya lakṣaṇam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upasthito hi nyāyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vratādeśanamarhati</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.2.2'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadyo niḥsaṃśayaḥ pāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na bhuñjītānupasthitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhuñjāno vardhayet pāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pariṣadyatra vartate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.2.3'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃśaye na tu bhoktavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvatkāryaviniścayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pramāṇenaiva kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāvadāśāsanaṃ tathā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.2.4'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtvā pāpaṃ na gūheta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gūhyamānaṃ tu vardhate</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svalpaṃ vātha prabhūtaṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmavidbhyo nivedayet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.2.5'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te hi pāpakṛtāṃ vaidyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>boddhāraścaiva pāpmanām</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥkhasyaiva yathā vaidyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siddhimanto rujāyatām</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.2.6'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāyaścitte samutpanne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrīmān satyaparāyaṇaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛdurārjavasaṃpannaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śuddhiṃ yāyāddvijaḥ sadā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='130'/>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.2.7'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sacelaṃ vāgyataḥ snātvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>klinnavāsāḥ samāhitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣatriyo vātha vaiśyo vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ pariṣadaṃ vrajet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.2.8'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upasthānaṃ tataḥ śīghram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>artimān dharaṇīṃ vrajan</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gātraiśca śirasā caiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na ca kiṃcidudāharet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.2.9'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataste praṇipātena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā taṃ samupasthitam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viprāḥ pṛcchanti yatkāryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upaveśyāsane śubhe</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.2.10'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ te kāryaṃ kimarthaṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ vā mṛgayase dvija</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parṣadi brūhi tatsarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatkāryaṃ hitamātmanaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <p>ityāṅgirasadharmaśāstre pariṣadupasthānaṃ nāma dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ</p>
	  </div>
	  <div type='adhyāya' n='3'>
	    <head>tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ</head>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.3.1'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satyena dyotate rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyena dyotate raviḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satyena dyotate vahniḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satye sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.3.2'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhūrbhuvaḥsvastrayolokās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>te 'pi satye pratiṣṭhitāḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmākaṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satyameva parā gatiḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='131'/>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.3.3'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi cedvakṣyate satyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niyataṃ prāpyate sukham</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadgṛhīto hyasatyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na ca śudhyeta karhicit</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.3.4'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satyenaiva viśudhyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śuddhikāmāśca mānavāḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmātprabrūhi yatsatyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādimadhyāvasānakam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.3.5'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ taiḥ samanujñātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyaṃ brūyādaśeṣataḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasminnivedite kārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>'pasāryo yastu kāryavān</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.3.6'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasminnutsārite pāpe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathāvaddharmapāṭhakāḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te tathā tatra kalpeyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vimṛśantaḥ parasparam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.3.7'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āptadharmeṣu yatproktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yacca sānugrahaṃ bhavet</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pariṣat saṃpadaścaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāryāṇāṃ ca balābalam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.3.8'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāpya deśaṃ ca kālaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yacca kāryāntaraṃ bhavet</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pariṣaccintya tatsarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaścittaṃ vinirdiśet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.3.9'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarveṣāṃ niścitaṃ yatsyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yacca prāṇānna pātayet</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhūya śrāvayedeko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yaḥ pariṣanniyojitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.3.10'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śṛṇuṣva bho idaṃ vipra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatta ādiśyate vratam</seg> /</l>
	      <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='132'/>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tattadyatnena kartavyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyathā te vṛthā bhavet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.3.11'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā ca te bhaveccīrṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadā śuddhiprakāśanam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāryaṃ sarvaprayatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na śaktyā viprapūjitam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <p>ityāṅgirasadharmaśāstre prāyaścittavidhānaṃ nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ</p>
	  </div>
	  <div type='adhyāya' n='4'>
	    <head>caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ</head>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.4.1'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāyo nāma tapaḥ proktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cittaṃ niścaya ucyate</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taponiścayasaṃyogāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaścittamiti smṛtam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.4.2'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāyaścittasamaṃ cittaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cārayitvā pradīyate</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parṣadā kriyate yattat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaścittamiti smṛtam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.4.3'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>catvāro vā trayo vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vedavedāgnihotriṇaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ye tu samyaksthitā viprāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāryākāryaviniścitāḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.4.4'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāyaścittapraṇetāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saptaite parikīrtitāḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='133'/>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekaviṃśatibhiścānyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pārṣadatvaṃ samāgataiḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.4.5'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāvitrīmātrasāraistu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cīrṇavedavratairdvijaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatīnāmātmavidyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhyāyināmātmavedinām</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='e'>śirovrataiśca snātānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='f'>eko 'pi pariṣadbhavet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.4.6'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ pūrvaṃ mayāpyuktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>teṣāṃ ye ye pare pare</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svavṛtyā parituṣṭānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pariṣattvamudāhṛtam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.4.7'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣāṃ laghuṣu kāryeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhyameṣu ca madhyamā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahāpātakacintāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śataśo bhūya eva vā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.4.8'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ata ūrdhvaṃ tu ye viprāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kevalaṃ nāmadhārakāḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pariṣattvaṃ na teṣvasti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasraguṇiteṣvapi</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.4.9'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>janmaśārīravidyābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ācāreṇa śrutena ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmeṇa ca yathoktena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇatvaṃ vidhīyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='134'/>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.4.10'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>citrakarma yathānekair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅgairunmīlyate śanaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brāhmaṇyamapi tadvatsyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃskārairmantrapūrvakaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <p>ityāṅgirasadharmaśāstre pariṣallakṣaṇaṃ nāma caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ</p>
	  </div>
	  <div type='adhyāya' n='5'>
	    <head>pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ</head>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.5.1'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cāturvedyo vikalpī ce</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅgaviddharmapāṭhakaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trayaścāśramiṇo mukhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parṣadeṣā daśāvarā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.5.2'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caturṇāmapi vedānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāragā ye dvijottamāḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svaiḥ svairaṅgairvināpyete</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cāturvedyā iti smṛtāḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.5.3'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmamya parṣadaścaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaścittakramasya ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trayāṇāṃ yaḥ pramāṇajñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa vikalpī bhaveddvijaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.5.4'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śabde chandasi kalpe ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śikṣāyāṃ caiva niścayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyotiṣāmayane caiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sanirukte 'ṅgavidbhavet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.5.5'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vedavidyāvratasnātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kulaśīlasamanvitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anekadharmaśāstrajñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṭhyate dharmapāṭhakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.5.6'>
