	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahmacaryāśramādūrdhvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āśramādvṛddha ucyate</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣāmeva tu vṛddhānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ya ete saṃprakīrtitāḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='135'/>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.5.7'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pariṣadbrāhmaṇānāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājñāṃ sā dviguṇā smṛtā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaiśyānāṃ triguṇā caiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parṣadvacca vrataṃ smṛtam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.5.8'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇānāṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu pāṭhakaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaiśyānāṃ caiva yo praṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ta eva vratadāḥ smṛtāḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.5.9'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aguruḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaiśyānāṃ cāpyayājakaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāyaścittaṃ samādiśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taptakṛcchraṃ samācaret</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.5.10'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamuddiśya varṇeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣatriyādiṣu darśanam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravṛttānāṃ tu vakṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaścittamanuttamam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.5.11'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śūdraḥ kālena śudhyeta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gobrāhmaṇahite rataḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dānairvāpyupavāsairvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvijaśuśrūṣaṇe rataḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.5.12'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>api vā mārgamālambya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣatradharmeṣu tiṣṭhataḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antarā brāhmaṇaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato 'sya vratamādiśet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.5.13'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmācchūdraṃ samāsādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā dharmapathe sthitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāyaścittaṃ pradātavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmavedavivarjitam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='136'/>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.5.14'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āpanno yena vā dharmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vrataṃ vā yena tuṣyati</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brāhmaṇānāṃ prasādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃtāryaḥ sarva eva hi</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <p>ityāṅgirasadharmaśāstre prāyaścittaniyantukathanaṃ nāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ</p>
	  </div>
	  <div type='adhyāya' n='6'>
	    <head>ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ</head>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.6.1'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paṇe tu parṣapakalpasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalpasya pariṣadbalam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāriṇaścāpyupasthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>balaṃ samyaṅniveditam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.6.2'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akalpā pariṣadyatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalpo vā pariṣadvinā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāryaṃ vāpyanyathoktaṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śuddhistatrāsya durlabhā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.6.3'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pariṣatkalpato kāryā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā sarve balīyasaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavanti na tathā pāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmin yoge 'vatīryate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.6.4'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evametatsamāsādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadyogaṃ ca praṇaśyati</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahatyāṃ cāmbhasi kṣiptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathālpalavaṇaṃ tathā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.6.5'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etadyogapradhānāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryāṇi pariśodhane</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taddravyaṃ karṇasaṃyogād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaktrāṇāmiva śodhane</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.6.6'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatpāpaṃ śāmyamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karturdharmeṇa śāstrataḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadvadvacchati kārtsnyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāgaśaḥ prabravīmi te</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.6.7'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gururātmavatāṃ śāstā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāstā rājā durātmanām</seg> /</l>
	      <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='137'/>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antaḥpracchannapāpānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāstā vaivasvato yamaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.6.8'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gurū rājā yamo vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāstā dharmeṇa yujyate</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāstā samucyate pāpād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āhato bhayataḥ śubham</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.6.9'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāyaścitte yadā cīrṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇe dagdhakilbiṣe</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmaṃ pṛcchāmi tattvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatpāpaṃ kva nu tiṣṭhati</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.6.10'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>naiva gacchati kartāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>naiva gacchati pārṣadam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mārutārkāṃśusaṃyogāj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jalavatsaṃpraśīryate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.6.11'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣāṃ tretāgninā dagdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāvakasya tu dhīmataḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naśyate nātra saṃdehaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sūryadṛṣṭirhimaṃ yathā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.6.12'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prabrūyātpakṣato yacca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāhyaṃ yaccāpi parṣadaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gacchatastāvubhau mūḍhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>narakaṃ tena karmaṇā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.6.13'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ajānan yastu vibrūyāj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jānanvāpyanyathā vadet</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ubhayorhi tayordoṣaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pakṣayorubhayorapi</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.6.14'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ajānānāṃ ca dātḥṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adatḥṇāṃ ca jānatām</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ bhavenmahādoṣas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmājjñātvā vadetsadā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.6.15'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yattu dattamajānadbhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaścittaṃ samāgataiḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='138'/>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatpāpaṃ śatadhā bhūtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dātḥnevopatiṣṭhati</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.6.16'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye tu samyaksthitā viprā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharmavedāṅgapāragāḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaktāste tāraṇe teṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmano 'nugrahasya ca</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <p>ityāṅgirasadharmaśāstre prāyaścittācārakathanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ</p>
	  </div>
	  <div type='adhyāya' n='7'>
	    <head>saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ</head>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.7.1'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārtānāṃ mārgamāṇānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaścitāni ye dvijāḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jānanto na prayacchanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>te ca yānti samaṃ tu taiḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.7.2'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmādārtaṃ samāsādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇaṃ tu viśeṣataḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jānadbhiḥ parṣadaḥ panthā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na hātavyaḥ parāṅmukhaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <note type='subheading'>prāyaścittaṃ vaktavyam</note>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.7.3'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya kārye vratādeśaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pramāṇārthaṃ hi dātṛbhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ajñānādupadeṣṭavyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kramaśaḥ sarva eva vā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.7.4'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhayādabhyuttaretkaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhayārtaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ kvacit</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ pāpātsamuddhṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena tulyaphalo bhavet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.7.5'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anarthitairanāhutair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apṛṣṭaiśca yathāvidhi</seg> /</l>
	      <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='139'/>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāyaścittaṃ na dātavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jānadbhirapi ca dvijaiḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.7.6'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmājjanaiḥ pradātavyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anujñāpya ca parṣadam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na cānyeṣu prajalpatsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caivaṃ dharmo na hīyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.7.7'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pātakeṣu śataṃ parṣat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sahasraṃ mahadādiṣu</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upapāpeṣu pañcāśat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svalpaṃ svalpeṣu niścayaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <note type='subheading'>pañcamahāpātakinaḥ</note>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.7.8'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahmahā svarṇahārī ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>surāpo gurutalpagaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etaiḥ saṃyujyate yo 'nyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patitaiḥ saha pañcamaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <note type='subheading'>patitāḥ</note>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.7.9'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nārīpuruṣahantā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kanyādūṣī gavāṃ ca hā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catvāraḥ patitā proktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā vai brahmahādayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='e'>upapātakāstvasaṃkhyātās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='f'>te ca goghnādayastathā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <p>ityāṅgirasadharmaśāstre pāpaparigaṇanaṃ nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ</p>
	  </div>
	  <div type='adhyāya' n='8'>
	    <head>aṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ</head>
	    <note type='subheading'>pratigrahe</note>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.1'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āhitāgnistu yo vipraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratigṛhṇāti śūdrataḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='140'/>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhoktḥṇāṃ samatāṃ yāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tiryagyoniṃ ca gacchati</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <note type='subheading'>śūdrānnabhojane</note>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.2'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yastu vedamadhīyāno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhuṅkte śūdrānnameva ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūdre vedaphalaṃ yāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūdratvaṃ ca sa gacchati</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <note type='subheading'>śūdraṃ praśasya svastivacane</note>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.3'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ghrātvā pītvā nirīkṣyātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>spṛṣṭvā ca pratigṛhya ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praśasya svasti cetyuktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhoktā eva na saṃśayaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.4'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ete doṣā bhavantīha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūdrānnasya parigrahe</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anugrahaṃ tu vakṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manunā coditaṃ purā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.5'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āmaṃ vā yadi vā pakvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūdrānnamupasevate</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kilbiṣaṃ bhuñjate bhoktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yaśca vipraḥ purohitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <note type='subheading'>pratigṛhyānyebhyo dātavyam</note>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.6'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guruvahnyatithīnāṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhṛtyānāṃ tu viśeṣataḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratigṛhya pradātavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na bhuñjīta svayaṃ tataḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <note type='subheading'>śūdrānnarasapuṣṭādhīyānasya</note>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.7'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śūdrānnarasapuṣṭasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cādhīyānasya nityaśaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='141'/>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>japato juhvato vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gatirūrdhvaṃ na vidyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <note type='subheading'>ṣaṇmāsaṃ bhuktau</note>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.8'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣaṇmāsānatha yo bhuṅkte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūdrasyānnaṃ nirantaram</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jīvanneva bhavecchūdro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛtaḥ śvā cābhijāyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.9'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akṛtvaiva nivṛttiṃ yaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūdrānnānmriyate dvijaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhitāgnirviśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa śūdragatibhāgbhavet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.10'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pakvānnavarja viprebhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>godhānyaṃ kṣatriyādapi</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaiśyāttu sarvadhānyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śadrāddhānyaṃ na kiṃcana</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.11'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anūdakaṃ tu tatsarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandhamālyavivarjitam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā varṇeṣu yaddattaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratigṛhṇīta vai dvijaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.12'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatta kṣetragataṃ dhānyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khale vā kaṇa eva vā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sārvakālaṃ gṛhītavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūdrādapyaṅgiro 'bravīt</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.13'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satpātre samanujñātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dugdhaṃ yacchucinā bhavet</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā caupadhikṛtyaṃ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadhnā vā payasāpi vā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.14'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pātrebhyo 'pi tathā grāhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūdrebhyaḥ prākṛtādapi</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūdraveśmani viprāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣīraṃ vā yadi vā dadhi</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.15'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nivṛttena na pātavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūdrānnasadṛśaṃ hi tat</seg> /</l>
	      <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='142'/>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agnyagāre gavāṃ goṣṭhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nadīvipragṛheṣu ca</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.16'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kūpasthāne tathāraṇye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>peyaṃ caiva payo dadhi</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āmaṃ māṃsaṃ dadhi ghṛtaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhānyaṃ kṣīramayauṣadham</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.17'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guḍo rasastathodaśvid</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhojyānyetāni nityaśaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśṛtaṃ cāranālaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāmbūlaṃ saktavastilāḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.18'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>phalāni piṇyākamatho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grāhyamauṣadhameva ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apraṇodyāni medhyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratigrāhyāṇi nityaśaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.19'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sūtake tu yadā vipro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahmacārī viśeṣataḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pibetpānīyamajñānād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhuṅakte vā saṃspṛśeta vā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.8.20'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pānīyapāne kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pañcagavyasya prāśanam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trirātropoṣaṇaṃ bhuṅkte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sparśe snānaṃ vidhīyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <p>ityāṅgirasadharmaśāstre śūdrānnādiniṣedhakathanaṃ nāmāṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ</p>
	  </div>
	  <div type='adhyāya' n='9'>
	    <head>navamo 'dhyāyaḥ</head>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.9.1'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>antardaśāhe bhuktvānnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūtake mṛtake 'pi vā</seg> /</l>
	      <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='143'/>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daśarātraṃ pivedvajraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇasya tu</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.9.2'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣatriyasyārdhamāptaṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśaḥ pañcādhikaṃ tathā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūdrasyaiva tu bhuktvānnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tribhirmāsairvyapohati</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.9.3'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āhitāgnistrirātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahmakṣatraviśāmapi</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pañcarātraṃ caredbhuktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrotriyasyāgnihotriṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.9.4'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ata ūrdhvaṃ tu snātānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māsāśaucaṃ na vidyate</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīkṣitānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājñāṃ sarvanidhestathā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.9.5'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sasatre dānadharme ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pakvamannaṃ tu garhitam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pañcarātraṃ caredvajraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣaḍahaṃ madhyamācaret</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.9.6'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā cānyeṣvabhojyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyahamevaṃ samācaret</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anāpatsu caredbhaikṣyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siddhaṃ vastu gṛhe vasan</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.9.7'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daśarātraṃ caredvajram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āpatsu ca tryahaṃ caret</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patitānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.9.8'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratimāsadinaṃ hṛṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyathā patito bhavet</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratisaṃvatsaraṃ vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrotriyasya bhavedidam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.9.9'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahmecārī yatiścāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyārthī gurupoṣakaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhvagaḥ kṣīṇavṛttiśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣaḍete bhikṣukāḥ smṛtāḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.9.10'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyādhitasya daridrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuṭumbātpracyutasya ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhvānaṃ vā prayātasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaikṣyacaryā vidhīyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.9.11'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahmacārī śunā daṣṭas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tryahamevaṃ samācaret</seg> /</l>
	      <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='144'/>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhasthastu dvirātraṃ vāpy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ekāhaṃ vāgnihotravān</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.9.12'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nābherūrdhvaṃ tu daṣṭasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadeva dviguṇaṃ bhavet</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadeva dviguṇaṃ vaktre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūrdhni ceva caturguṇam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.9.13'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ata ūrdhvaṃ tu yatsnātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>snānenaiva viśudhyati</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarveṣvevāvakāśeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā pravrajitaḥ svayam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.9.14'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avratī savratī vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śunā daṣṭastathā dvijaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭāgniṃ hūyamānaṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadya eva śucirbhavet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.9.15'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brāhmaṇī tu śunā daṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>some dṛṣṭiṃ nipātayet</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadā na dṛśyate somaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaścittaṃ kathaṃ bhavet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.9.16'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāṃ diśaṃ tu gataḥ somas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāṃ diśaṃ tu vilokayet</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>somamārgeṇa sā pūtā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañcagavyena śudhyati</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <p>ityāṅgirasadharmaśāstre abhakṣyabhakṣaṇaprāyaścittavidhirnāma navamo 'dhyāyaḥ</p>
	  </div>
	  <div type='adhyāya' n='10'>
	    <head>daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ</head>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.1'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daṇḍādūrdhvaṃ tu yatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praharettu nipātayet</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dviguṇaṃ govrataṃ tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <note type='subheading'>daṇḍalakṣaṇam</note>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.2'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṅguṣṭhamātraṃ sthūlaḥ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāhumātrapramāṇataḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='145'/>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sārdraśca sapalāśaśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daṇḍa ityabhidhīyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <note type='subheading'>gavāṃ rodhanādinā maraṇe</note>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.3'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rodhane bandhane vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yojane vā gavāṃ rujā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utpanne maraṇe vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nimittaṃ tatra vidyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.4'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pādamekaṃ caredrodhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvau pādau bandhane caret</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yojanaṃ pādahīnaṃ syāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caretsarvaṃ nipātane</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.5'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na nārikelena na phālakena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na mauñjinā nāpi ca valkalena</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etaiśca gāvo na hi bandhanīyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>badhvā tu tiṣṭhetparaśuṃ pragṛhya</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.6'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kuśakāśaistu badhnīyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ūrdhvaṃ dakṣiṇatomukham</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāśalagne tathā dāhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='146'/>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.7'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi tatra bhavecchokaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaścittaṃ kathaṃ bhavet</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>japitvā pātamānīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mucyate sarvakilbiṣāt</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.8'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asthibhaṅgaṃ gavāṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lāṅgūlacchedanaṃ tathā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pātanaṃ caiva śṛṅgasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māsārdhaṃ yāvakaṃ pibet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.9'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vraṇabhaṅge ca kartavyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>snehābhyaṅgaśca pāṇinā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yavasaścopahartavyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāvadrūḍhavraṇo bhavet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.10'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asthibhaṅge tathā śṛṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṭibhaṅge tathaiva ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvajjīvati ṣaṇmāsān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.11'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śruṅgabhaṅge 'sthibhaṅge ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>carmanirmocane tathā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daśarātraṃ pibedvajraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāvatsvasti bhavettadā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.12'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyatrāṅkanalakṣmabhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāhanirmocane tathā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāyaṃ saṃgopanārthaṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na duṣyedrodhabandhayoḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='147'/>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.13'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yantreṇa gocikitsārthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūḍhagarbhavimocane</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatne kṛte vipadyeta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na doṣastatra vidyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.14'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>auṣadhaṃ snehamāhāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dadyādgobrāhmaṇe hitam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāṇināṃ prāṇavṛttyarthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.15'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaje vājini vā vyāghre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khaḍge śyāmamṛge vṛke</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siṃhe śuni varāhe ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayūre pakṣiṇāmapi</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.16'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāke haṃse ca gṛdhre ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṭiṭṭibhe khañjarīṭake</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā gavi tathā vindyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhagavānmanurabravīt</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.17'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mohādvirūḍhamācārya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyāvṛttau tu yo dvijaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāyaścittaṃ na mṛgyeta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śṛṇu tasyāpi yo vidhiḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.18'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vihihataṃ yadakāmānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāmāttaddviguṇaṃ bhavet</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paścāttu dahyāttāpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtvā pāpāni mānavaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.19'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhanatyāgaṃ gṛhe kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvatyāgena śudhyati</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dravyairvā vipulairviprān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>toṣayedyaḥ suniścitam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <note type='subheading'>bālavṛddhāṅganānāṃ prāyaścittam</note>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.20'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tannāryaḥ kāmataḥ prāptāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāpamardhaṃ samādiśet</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arvāktu dvādaśādabdāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puruṣo hyardhabhāgbhavet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='148'/>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.10.21'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aśītiryasya cāpūrṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṣārdhaṃ sakalo vidhiḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāyaścittasya ye klība</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālavṛddhāṅganādayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='e'>teṣu sarveṣu saṃcintya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='f'>pādamekaṃ samācaret</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <p>ityāṅgirasadharmaśāstre hiṃsāyāyaścittakathanaṃ nāma daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ</p>
	  </div>
	  <div type='adhyāya' n='11'>
	    <head>ekādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ</head>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.11.1'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upapātakarmasakto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>goghno muñjīta yāvakam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akṣāralavaṇaṃ rūkṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣaṣṭhe kāle 'sya bhojanam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.11.2'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtāvāpo vane goṣṭhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>carmaṇā tena saṃvṛtaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvau māsau snānamabhyaṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomūtreṇa vidhīyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.11.3'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pādaśaucakriyā kāryā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adbhiḥ kurvīta kevalam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vrativaddhārayedaṇḍaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samantrāṃ mekhalāṃ tathā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.11.4'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gāścaivānuvrajennityaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rajastāsāṃ sadā pibet</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiṣṭhantīṣvanutiṣṭhecca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vrajantīṣvapyanuvrajet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.11.5'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śuśrūṣitvā namaskṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rātrau vīrāsanaṃ vaset</seg> /</l>
	      <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='149'/>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomatīṃ ca japedvidvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>okāraṃ vedameva ca</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.11.6'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āturāmabhiśastāṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>coravyāghrādibhirbhayaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patitāṃ paṅkalagnāṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvaprāṇairvimokṣayet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.11.7'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uṣṇe varṣati śīte vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mārute vāti vā bhṛśam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kurvītātmanastrāṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gorakṛtvā svaśaktitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.11.8'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ātmano yadi vānyeṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhekṣetre 'thavā khale</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhakṣayantīṃ na kathayet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pibantaṃ caiva vatsakam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.11.9'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anena vidhinā goghno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yastu gā anugacchati</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa gohatyātmakāt pāpān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.11.10'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣabhaikādaśā gāśca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dadyātsucaritavrataḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avidyamāne sarvasvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vedavidbhyo nivedayet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.11.11'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eteṣāṃ vihitaṃ puṇyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛcchramaṅgirasā svayam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmavidbhiranūcānair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upapātakanāśanam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <p>ityāṅgirasadharmaśāstre govadhaprāyaścittaṃ nāmaikādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ</p>
	  </div>
	  <div type='adhyāya' n='12'>
	    <head>dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ</head>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.12.1'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaścittavidhiṃ śubham</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yamadhītya vimuñcanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrutvā smṛtvā ca vai dvijāḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.12.2'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadā triṣavaṇaṃ snāyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakṛtsnātvā payaḥ pibet</seg> /</l>
	      <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='150'/>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prātaḥ snātvā samārambhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuryājjapyaṃ tu nityaśaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.12.3'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāvitrīṃ vyāhṛtīṃ vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>japedaṣṭasahasrakam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>oṃkāramāditaḥ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpe rūpe tathāntaram</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.12.4'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthānaṃ vīrāsanaṃ śaktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuryādāsanameva vā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsanaṃ śalyaviddhaṃ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>amadhaḥśāyī bhavetsadā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.12.5'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gavyasya payaso 'lābhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gavyameva bhaveddadhi</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dadhyabhāve bhavettakraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>takrābhāve tu yāvakam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.12.6'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣāmanyatamaṃ yaccāpy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upapadyeta tatpibet</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomūtreṇa tu saṃyuktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāvakaṃ tatpibeddvijaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.12.7'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etattu vihitaṃ puṇyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛcchramaṅgirasā svayam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praṇavātta samārambho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāmnā vajramiti smṛtam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.12.8'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etatpātakayuktānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahāpātakasaṃyuktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varṣaiḥ śudhyanti te tribhiḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.12.9'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athopapātakāścintyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā kālaṃ samādiśet</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kālasya tu yathoktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇastatra kāraṇam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.12.10'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brāhmaṇā eva ca kṣetraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇā eva daivatam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brāhmaṇānāṃ prasādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sūryo divi virājate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.12.11'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na brāhmaṇasamaṃ kṣetraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na brāhmaṇasamo 'nalaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidhirna brāhmaṇādūrdhvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na daivaṃ brāhmaṇātparam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1953' n='151'/>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.12.12'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>japatāṃ juhvatāṃ caiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yacchato ca satāmapi</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣetro 'gnestu susaṃbhūto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇo 'dya viśiṣyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.12.13'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na skandate na vyathate</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na vinaśyati karhicit</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>variṣṭhamagnihotrebhtho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇasya mukhe hutam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.12.14'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devanāpitṛbhūtānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kācidbhavati kasyacit</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brāhmaṇe devatāḥ sarvāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa ca sarvasya devatā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.12.15'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo hi yāṃ devatāmicched</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārādhayitumavyayam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvopāyaprayatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>toṣayedbrāhmaṇān sadā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <lg xml:id='Ang_2.12.16'>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samastasaṃpatsamavāptihetavaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samutthitāpatkulakṣmaketavaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apārasaṃsārasamudrasetavaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punantu māṃ brāhmaṇapādapāṃsavaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	    <p>ity āṅgirasadharmaśāstre kṛcchrādisvarūpakathanaṃ nāma dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ</p>
	  </div>
	  <div>
	    <p>ity uttarāṅgirasam</p>
	  </div>
	</div>
	<div>
	  <p>ity āṅgirasasmṛtiḥ</p>
	</div>
      </div>
    </body>
